chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi pūṣasadbhāvanimittaṁ pēṣaṇaṁ
bhavēt । na tvēvamasti, nimittasyāpratītatvāt । kintarhi ? “pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ syāt” iti vākyātpūṣabhāganimittamētatpēṣaṇaṁ pratīyatē । na ca tadapi sambhavati, dēvatāyā mukhya ēvāsambhavāt । bhajasēvāyāmityasmātkarmasādhanō'yaṁ bhāgaśabdaḥ । bhajyatē sēvyata ityarthaḥ । na ca dēvatā haviḥ sēvatē, dēvatāyā bhōktr̥tvasya navamē niṣēdhāt । tēna lākṣaṇikō'yaṁ bhāgaśabdaḥ । yaddhi yaduddēśēna tyajyatē tattēna bhajyata iti lōkasiddham । tēna mukhyabhajanatvāsa- mbhavāttatpūrvabhāvyuddēśatyāgō lakṣyatē । tēnāyamarthaḥ—pūṣaṇamuddiśya yaḥ tyajyatē sa pūṣṇō bhāgaḥ । na caindrāpauṣṇaṁ haviḥ pūṣaṇamuddiśya tyajyatē, indrapūṣavyāsaṅgitvāduddēśasya । tēnaitatpēṣaṇaṁ pūṣamātraprayuktaṁ na, nāpi tadbhāgaprayuktam । kintu taduddēśatyāgarūpayāgadvārēṇa yāgāpūrvaprayuktam ।
taduktam—

lg.l: na hyēṣa dēvatādharmō na tadbhāgasya gamyatē ।

chapter.p: ( taṁ. vā., pr̥. 887 )
na cēndrapūṣabhāgāpūrvapēṣaṇaṁ karttavyaṁ na tu dvidēvatyē (?) ।

prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—ēkasminnēva pūṣṇi /?/vākyē'rthaśabdō bhavēt । yāgātprathamarūpārthadharmatvāt । kratūbha-
yōrindrapūṣṇōrddēvatvē aindrāgnavat । yadvā “āgnēyaṁ caturddhā karōti” iti caturddhākaraṇavaddvidēvatyē aindrāgna (?) iti ।।

lg.l: yō nāma kaścidiha saṁviditaṁ pramēyaṁ granthāntarē likhati vā vadati svayaṁ vā ।।
sākr̥rtr̥tāmananukīrttya sa kīrttilōpāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhr̥yāt ।।

chapter.head: tr̥tīyasyādhyāyasya tr̥tīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
atha tr̥tīyādhyāyasya pañcamaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamamupāṁśuyājē śēṣakāryābhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
stō darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra śrūyatē—“uttarārddhātsviṣṭakr̥tē samavadyati, iḍāmavadyati” iti । tathānyānyapi śēṣakāryāṇi । tatra sandēhaḥ—kimājyādupāṁśuyājadravyātsviṣṭakr̥darthamavadātavyaḥ ? tr̥tīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ upalabdhamātr̥kāyāṁ nāsti ।
uta nēti । sarvapradānādhikaraṇē śēṣasadbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ । ‘sarvēbhyō vā kāraṇāviśēṣāt’ (jai. sū., 3. 4. 44.) ityatra sarvēbhyō havirbhyaḥ śēṣakāryaṁ kartavyamiti nirūpitam । tasyēdānīmatiprasakta- syāpavādaḥ kriyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“śēṣātsviṣṭakr̥tē samavadyati” ityādi- śēṣakāryavidhīnāmaviśēṣapravr̥ttatvādupāṁśuyājasyāpi yadājyadravyaṁ tatpratipattitvamaviśiṣṭaṁ sviṣṭakr̥dādikarmaṇāmiti । nanu nāvaśyaṁ tāvadājyadravyasya sarvārthatvācchjatērapyupāṁśuyājaśēṣatvēna pratipattyapē- kṣitvam । nāpi jauhavasyājyasya ; “caturavattaṁ juhōti” iti vacanēna kr̥tsnasyaiva hōmasambandhāvagamāt । ataḥ kathamupāṁśuyājā- jyasamarthatvaṁ sviṣṭakr̥dādānāmiti । ucyatē—yadyapi jauhavājyasya “caturavattaṁ juhōti” iti sambandhaḥ pratīyatē, tathāpi sviṣṭakr̥dādīnāṁ prakaraṇāvagatasakalapradhānasambandhanirvāhāya juhvāṁ kiñcicchēṣayitavyam । yathā “camasairjuhōti” ityatra satyapi hōmasambandhē śēṣakāryavaśēna śēṣaḥ sthāpyatē, tathātrāpīti । ēvañca “sarvēbhyō havirbhyaḥ samavadyati” iti sarvahavissambandhānuvādō'pyupapatsyatē । tēnā/?/jyādapi sviṣṭakr̥dartha- mavadātavyam । aviśēṣēṇa sarvasaṁyōgāvagamāditi । ēvaṁprāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyupāṁśuyājadravyasyājyasya śēṣō/?/ bhavēt, tathāhi—dhruvāyāṁ tāvadupāṁśuyājasya śēṣō nāstītyuktamēva । na ca juhvāmapyasti । “caturavattaṁ juhōti” iti vacanēna kr̥tsnasyaiva hōmasambandhāvagamāt । na ca kr̥tsnasya hōmasambandhē'pi śēṣa- kāryavaśēnaiva śēṣasthāpanamiti vācyam । śēṣakāryāṇāṁ pratipatti- rūpatvēna dravyasthāpanaprayōjakatvābhāvāt । camasēṣu na śēṣakārya- vaśēna śēṣasthāpanam । kintu vacanavaśādēva । ēvaṁ hi tatra śrūyatē— “alpaṁ juhōti” iti । na cātra vacanamēvaṁbhūtamasti । yattu “sarvēbhyō havirbhyaḥ samavadyati” ityanuvādadarśanātsarvatraiva śēṣasa- dbhāva ityuktam, tadayuktam ; anuvādatvēna sarvaśabdasya yathā- prāptagōcaratvāt । ‘sarvē brāhmaṇā bhuktavanta’ itivadvidyamānaśēṣaviṣaya- tvēnōpapattēḥ । ataḥ śēṣābhāvādupāṁśuyājājyē nāsti śēṣa- kāryamiti ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—aśēṣatvācchēṣābhāvā- nnāsti śēṣakāryam । aśēṣatvañca sarvasyaiva hōmārthamādānāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṁ sākaṁprasthāyīyē śēṣakāryābhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsau prakr̥tya śrūyatē—“sākamprasthāyīyēna yajēta” iti । tatra sandēhaḥ—kiṁ sviṣṭakr̥dasti nāstīti । atrōdāharaṇā- ntarē'dhikāśaṅkāṁ nirākarttuṁ pūrvōktanyāyō'tidiśyatē । iha ca sākamprasthāyīyaṁ nāma karmāntaraṁ na vidhīyatē । kintu sānnāyyapātrābhyāṁ dadhipayaḥpūrṇakumbhīmyāṁ saha prasthānalakṣaṇō guṇaḥ paśurūpē phalē vidhīyata iti rathantarapādē ‘ayanēṣu cōdanā/?/ntaraṁ saṁjñōpabandhāt’ ityatrādhikaraṇē sthāpitam । idānīṁ śēṣakāryamatrāsti navēti vicāryatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣiṇō'bhisandhiḥ—kumbhībhyāṁ saha prasthāna- lakṣaṇō guṇaḥ phalāya vidhīyamānaḥ sānāyyādhikārabhūta iti tāvatsiddham । prakr̥tau ca sviṣṭakr̥dindrapradānārthasānnāyyādavadīyata ityapi siddham । tadvikāratvādatidēśaprāpta ihāpyavadātavyam । na cātrōpāṁśuyājavacchēṣō nāstīti vācyam । tatra hi dhrauvājyasya sādhāraṇatvājjauhavājyasya ca “caturavattaṁ juhōti” iti vacanēna
sarvasyaiva hōmasambandhāvagamāt yuktaḥ śēṣābhāvaḥ । iha tu sānnāyyasya sādhāraṇatvābhāvātkr̥tsnahōmavidhānābhāvācca śēṣabhāvā- datidēśaprāptēḥ śēṣakāryairbhavitavyamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyatrāpi śēṣaḥ sambhavēt । tathā hi— yāvaddhōtavyaṁ dravyaṁ tāvataiva sahāhavanīyadēśaṁ prati prasthīyata iti yuktam । tadiha hōmārthaṁ kumbhībhyāṁ saha prasthānavidhānaṁ kumbhīyamiti tasyaiva yadi hōmasambandhō vidhīyatē tadaiva paraṁ dr̥ṣṭārthaṁ bhavati, itarathā tvadr̥ṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgaḥ । na cāhavanīyadēśātkumbhībhyāṁ saha prasthāyā- vadāya hōtavyamiti vācyam । “agnīdhē srucau pradāya saha kumbhī- bhirabhikrāmannāha” ityavadānasādhanasrukparityāgēna gamanavidhānā- sambhavāt । tēnāpi kumbhīparimitasyaiva sānnāyyasya hōmasbandhā- vagamēna śēṣābhāvānnāsti śēṣakāryamiti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu sākaṁprasthāyīyē'pyupāṁśuyā- javatsviṣṭakr̥diḍaṁ na karttavyamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha tr̥tīyaṁ sautrāmaṇyāṁ śēṣakāryābhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti sautrāmaṇā । tatra grahāḥ śrūyantē āśvinasārasva- taindrāḥ । tatra kēṣāñcitpiṣṭaprabhavasurādravyakatvēnāgnēyavikāratvāccōda- kēna sviṣṭakr̥diḍaṁ prāptam । athēdānīṁ sandēhaḥ—kinnivartatē ? uta nēti । atrāpyudāharaṇāntarēṣvadhikāśaṅkāṁ nirākarttuṁ sa ēva nyāyō'tidiśyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—kēṣāñcit piṣṭadravyaprabhavasurādravyakatvēnā- gnēyavikāratvāt payōdravyakatvēna ca sānnāyyavikāratvādatidēśāt sviṣṭakr̥dādiśēṣakāryaprāptistāvadasti । na ca śēṣō nāsti । jyōtiṣṭōmasōmacamasēṣviva vācanikaśēṣasadbhāvasya pratīyamānatvāt । ēvaṁ hyatra śrūyatē—“ucchinaṣṭi na sarvaṁ juhōti” iti । ataḥ śēṣasa- dbhāvādasti śēṣakāryamiti । nanu śēṣasya pratipattyantaraṁ śrūyatē । tatra grahasya tāvat—“brāhmaṇaṁ parikrīṇīyāducchēṣaṇasya pātāram” iti parikrītabrāhmaṇasya pātuḥ, surāgrahaśēṣasyāpi “śatātr̥ṇṇāyāṁ vikṣāgyanti” iti śatātr̥ṇṇārūpapātraviśēṣē kṣāraṇamiti balīya-
saupadēśikapratipatyantarēṇātidēśikapratipattērbādha ēvēti । maivam ; virōdhābhāvāt, sviṣṭakr̥dādyanuṣṭhānāvaśiṣṭasyaiva caturddhāpurōḍāśabhakṣa- ṇavat pānavikṣāraṇayōrupapattēḥ । tēna śēṣaśadbhāvāt karttavyamēva śēṣakāryamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi kr̥tsnasyaiva śēṣasyaupadēśikapratipa- ttisambandhō na bhavēt । tathāhi-“payōgrahān juhōti” iti vacanāt kr̥tsnasyaiva hōmasambandhaḥ pratīyatē । tatra yathā “ucchinaṣṭi na sarvaṁ juhēti” iti vacanēna śēṣasadbhāvaḥ pratipādyatē । tathā kr̥tsnasyaiva śēṣasya parikrītabrāhmaṇabhakṣaṇaśatātr̥ṇṇākṣāraṇasambandhēnōpadēśādēvāvagata- tvāt na kiñcitkarttavyamiti na pratipatyantarāpēkṣā samasti, yēnāti- dēśikī pratipattiḥ sambadhyatē । purōḍāśē tu “uttarārddhātsviṣṭakr̥tē samavadyati” ityēkadēśamātrasyaiva sviṣṭakr̥dādyarthatvādavaśiṣṭasya caturddhākr̥tasya vacanavaśādbhakṣaṇārthatvamapi । na cēha tathēti śēṣābhā- vānnāsti sviṣṭakr̥dādiśēṣakāryamiti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu-sautrāmaṇyāṁ grahēṣu śēṣakāryaṁ na karttavyamiti na śāstrādatidiśyata iti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṁ sarvapr̥ṣṭhēṣṭyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti sarvapr̥ṣṭhēṣṭiḥ—“indrāya rāthantarāya, indrāya vārhatāya indrāya vairūpāya indrāya vairājāyēndrāya śākkarāya indrāya raivatāya” iti । tatra purōḍāśō bahūnāṁ karmaṇāṁ sādhāraṇaḥ । tatra sandēhaḥ— kiṁ pratikarma sviṣṭakr̥diḍaṁ karttavyam ? uta sakr̥dēvēti । pūrvaṁ śēṣa- kāryamēva nāstīti cintitam । idānīṁ satsu śēṣakāryēṣu prasaṅgēna tadviśēṣaścintyatē । atraika ēvēndraḥ śrūyatē tathāpi rathantaravairūpādiviśē- ṣaṇabhēdēna dēvatātadguṇādēva ṣaḍēva karmāṇi bhinnānīti vyavasthitam । tatra yēṣāṁ śākhināṁ pratikarma ṣaḍēva purōḍāśāstēṣāṁ nāyaṁ vicāraḥ । yēṣāntu ṣaṭkarmasādhāraṇa ēka ēva purōḍāśō rathacakraparimitaḥ śrūyatē tēṣāmayaṁ vicāraḥ-karmabhēdātpratikarma śēṣakāryaṁ karttavyam ? uta dravyaikatvānnēti । nanu ‘ēkadravyē ca saṁskārāṇāṁ vyākhyāta- mēkatvam’ ityēkādaśādhikaraṇēnaiva gatamidam । tatra hyātitthōpasada- gnīṣōmīyānēkakarmasādhanē'pi barhiṣi dravyaikatvē lavanādisaṁskārāṇāṁ tantratvamiti nirūpitam, tadvadihāpyanēkakarmasādhanasyāpyēkasya purōḍāśasya sviṣṭakr̥dādayaḥ saṁskārāstantraṁ bhaviṣyantīti । ucyatē-
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣiṇā'bhisandhiḥ—sādhāraṇāṅgāminō hi saṁskārē na punaḥ saṁskārāpēkṣā samastīti bhavatu tadgāmināṁ saṁskā- rāṇāṁ viśēṣāgrahaṇāttantratvam । iha punarēkatvē'pi purōḍāśāvayava- bhēdēnānēkakarmasādhanatvē sati viśēṣagrahaṇātsaṁskr̥tē'pyēkadēśa ēkadēśāntarasya saṁskārāpēkṣā samastāti na tantratvam । atō dravyaikatvē'pi karmabhēdād bhēdēnaiva sviṣṭakr̥tsaṁskāraḥ karttavya iti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyayaṁ hūyamānasaṁskāraḥkarmasaṁskārō vā bhavēt । tathāhi—avadānadēśadvārēṇa karmaṇā huyamānasya ca saṁskārādavadānadēśasya ca bhinnattvādviśēṣagrahaṇādbhavatyēvāvr̥ttiḥ । na tvētadasti, adr̥ṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgāt । kintvatidēśaprāptō'yaṁ prakr̥tya- nusārēṇa śrutaśēṣasaṁskāraḥ । ēka ēva cāsau purōḍāśaḥ sarva- sādhāraṇō bhavati । taduktam—
(taṁ. vā., pr̥. 996)
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu avibhāgādēkatvācchēṣasya sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt sādhāraṇatvāt tantratvamēva sviṣṭakr̥dādīnā- miti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamamaindravāyavē dvirbhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
chapter.sutra: aindravāyavē tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāt ।।3.5.18।।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyōtiṣṭōmaḥ—“jyōtiṣṭōmēna svargakāmō yajēta” iti । tatraindravāyavagrahē sandēhaḥ—kiṁ sakr̥t bhakṣaṇam ? uta dviriti । atrānantarādhikaraṇapratipādyaṁ sōmaśēṣabhakṣaṇaṁ siddhaṁ kr̥tvā pūrvā- dhikaraṇāpavādatvēnānantaramidamārabhyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ-aindravāyavē hi dvirāvr̥ttō hōmō dravyaṁ caikamēva । tatra pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyēna sakr̥dbhakṣaṇēnaiva śēṣapratipattisiddhēḥ sakr̥dēva bhakṣaṇamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi bhakṣaṇāvr̥ttipratipādakaṁ vacanāntaraṁ
na bhavēt । ēvaṁ hi śrūyatē—“dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati dvirhyētasya vaṣaṭkarōti” iti । atō vacanabalādbhakṣaṇamapyāvr̥ttamiti siddham । tadētadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṁ śrīmadvāttiṁkakārapādā nānumanyantē, sandēhābhāvāt । na hi pratyakṣavacanē sati sandēhō bhavati । nanvēvaṁ- vidhānyadhikaraṇāni dr̥śyanta ēva, yēṣu nyāyēna pūrvapakṣē vacanēna siddhāntaḥ । yathā vārttikakāramatē vāyavyapaśāvatidēśaprāptā “tvaṁ hyagnē prathamō manōtā” ityāgnēyī manōtā । tatra vāyupadōhēna prayōktavyamiti nyāyāt pūrvapakṣaṁ kr̥tvā “yadyaṣyanyadēvatyaḥ paśugagnē- yyēva manōtā kāryā” iti vacanāt siddhāntitam, tathēhāpi syāditi । naitatḥ tatraiva tadbhavati yatra pratipāditō nyāyō vacanādbādhitō bhavati । vacanābhāvē sa na syāt । yathā manōtāyām । ēvaṁ hi tatra nyāyaḥ—agnīṣōmīyē paśau yadyapi samuditayōrdēvatātvaṁ manōtā cāgnimātraprakāśikā, tathāpyagnēḥ samavētatvānmantrasya ca samavētaprakāśanēna sarvatrārthavatvātprakr̥tau mantra- prayōgē sati agnirahitāyāṁ vikr̥tāvūhaḥ karttavya iti । sa caiṣa nyāyō vacanēna bādhitaḥ । yatra samuditadēvatyē prakr̥tau karmaṇyanyataraprakāśa- nēna samavētārthō mantrō vikr̥tau anyadēvatyē karmaṇyūhēna prāpnōti, tatra phaliṣyati । iha tu pūrvādhikaraṇēnaivāsya nyāyasya siddhatvā- tkimanēnādhikaraṇēnēti । sūtrantu pūrvādhikaraṇaśēṣatvēnaiva vyākhyēyam ।
tathāhi—ēvaṁ tatra śaṅakanīyam—“dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati dvihyēṁtasya vaṣaṭkarōti” ityatra hi vaṣaṭkārōpalakṣitapradhānabhēdā- dēva bhakṣaṇarūpapratipattibhēdaṁ vēda ēva pratipādayati । tēna sarva- pr̥ṣṭhāyāṁ satyapi dravyaikatvē pradhānabhēdātsviṣṭakr̥dādipratipattibhēdēna bhavitavyamēvēti । tatrēdamupāttam-aindravāyavē tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāditi । asyārthaḥ—nātra pradhānabhēdahētukaḥ pratipattihētubhēdaḥ pratipādyatē । kintarhi ? bācanikaṁ, hētvadhikaraṇē caivaṁvidhānāṁ hētutvasya nirākr̥tatvāditi । ēvañca pūrvādhikaraṇaśēṣatvē sati sōmabhakṣa- sāmānyavicāramakr̥tvā viśēṣavicāravyatikramō na bhaviṣyatīti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṁ sōmē śēṣabhakṣādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyōtiṣṭōmē santi sōmāḥ । tēṣu sandēhaḥ—kiṁ tēṣāṁ śēṣō bhakṣayitavyaḥ ? uta nēti । darśapūrṇamāsayōḥ śēṣapratipattiṁ vicā- ryēdānīṁ prasaṅgēna jyōtiṣṭōmasya sōmaśēṣabhakṣaṇarūpā pratipatti- rvicāryatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “alpaṁ juhōti” iti vacanādgraha- camasayōrasti sōmaśēṣaḥ, tathāpi bhakṣaṇarūpapratipattiprāpakōpadēśā- bhāvānmūlaprakr̥titvēna cātidēśāsambhavānnāsti bhakṣaṇamiti । nanu caindravāyavē tāvat “dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati” ityupadēśāt bhakṣaṇaṁ prāpnōtītyuktamēva । ēvamanyatrāpi bhakṣaṇapratipādakaliṅgadarśanamasti- “sarvataḥ parihāramāśvinaṁ bhakṣayati” iti । atra prāptabhakṣaṇānuvādēna sarvataḥ parihāralakṣaṇaṁ bhakṣaṇasya niḥśēṣatvaṁ vidhīyatē । tathā “bhakṣitāpyāyitāṁścamasāndakṣiṇasyāvalambē havirddhānē sādayanti” ityatrāpi prāptabhakṣaṇānuvādēna camasasya havirddhānadakṣiṇadēśāsādanaṁ vidhīyatē । ēkadēśasthamapi ca liṅgaṁ sthālīpulākanyāyēna sarvatra prāpakamasti । atō'sti sarvatraiva bhakṣaṇamiti । taduktaṁ sūtrakr̥tā- ‘syādvānyarthadarśanāt’ iti । maivam; pramāṇāntarāvagatārthadyōtakaṁ liṅgam, na tu prāpakam । na cātra pramāṇāntaraṁ prāpakamastīti na bhakṣaṇamiti । atha prāpakapramāṇābhāvādēva tānyēva vacanānyaṅgatā- viśiṣṭavidhānādbhakṣaṇaprāpakāṇi, tathāpi yathōpadēśamēva bhakṣaṇaṁ na sarvatra । taduktaṁ sūtrakr̥tā—‘vacanānyapūrvatvāta tasmādyathōpadēśaṁ syaḥ’ iti । yattvāpātataḥ siddhāntasūtratvēnaivaitatsūtraṁ bhāṣyē pratibhāti, na tattathaiva grāhyam । kintu vārttikānusārēṇa bhāṣyamapyavahitaiḥ
pūrvapakṣānuguṇatvēnaiva kāryamiti । atō yāvadvacanamēva sōmabhakṣaṇa- miti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyatra samākhyādibhēdabhinnaḥ sarvatrai- vōpadēśō bhakṣaṇasya prāpakō na bhavēt । tathāhi—camasēṣu tāvat “praitu hōtuḥ camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prōdgātr̥̄ṇāṁ pra yajamānasya” ityēvamā- dikāḥ praiṣagatāssamākhyāḥ santi । camasasamākhyāścādanārthasya camudhātōḥ prayōgādadyatē asminnityarthē bhavanti । na capraiṣavēlāyāṁ tatra camanaṁ bhūtaṁ varttamānaṁ vōpalabhyata iti pāriśēṣyādbhaviṣyaccamana- pratipādaka ēvōpadēśō'numīyatē । “alpaṁ juhōti” iti darśanāt sōmēśēṣavantaścamasāḥ prēṣitā iti tasyaivāpēkṣitā pratipattiriti śēṣasya bhakṣaṇaṁ gamyatē । na ca hōtrādīnāmēva camasināṁ hōtrādi- sambandhēnaiva samākhyādarśanāt । kiñca yadi pra yajamānasyēti samākhyayā yajamānasya śēṣabhakṣaṇaṁ prāpyatē, tadā “yadi rājanyaṁ vaiśyaṁ vā yājayēt sa yadi sōmaṁ vibhakṣayiṣēt” ityatra phalacamasa- vidhau “na sōmam” iti sōmabhakṣaṇapratiṣēdhasaṅkīrttanaṁ nāvakalpēta samākhyāvyatiriktasya yajamānacamasē bhakṣaṇaprāpakasyābhāvāt । tasmādasti camasēṣu samākhyayā bhakṣaṇamiti siddham ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē yadi yāvadvacanaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ tadā na hōtrādīnāṁ camasēṣu bhakṣaṇam । siddhāntē tu samākhyayā hōtrādīnāṁ bhakṣaṇamiti । sūtrantu—samākhyābalāccamasēṣvasti śēṣabhakṣaṇaṁ samākhyayā bhakṣaṇaṁ saṁyōganimittatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṁ sasubrahmaṇyōdgātr̥bhakṣādhikaraṇ
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyōtiṣṭōmaḥ—“jyōtiṣṭōmēna svargakāmō yajēta” iti । tatrāsti praiṣaḥ—“praitu hōtuścamasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prōdgātr̥̄ṇām” iti । atra samākhyānādbhakṣa ityuktam । tatra sandēhaḥ—kimēka ēva camasamudgōtā bhakṣayēt ? uta sarvē bhakṣayēyuḥ ? atha vā subrahmaṇya- varjitāśchandōgā bhakṣayēyuḥ ? athavā saha subrahmaṇyēna ? iti । samākhyānimittaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ pratipādyēdanīṁ prasaṅgāt tadgataviśēṣa- ścintyatē । atra bahuvacanaśrutēḥ prakr̥tityayavisaṁvādēna sandēhaḥ । prōdgātr̥̄ṇāmityasyaiva vicāraviṣayatvam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—udgātr̥̄ṇāmiti bahuvacanaṁ śrūyatē । ēkaścō-
dgātā, “udgātāraṁ vr̥ṇīta” iti vacanāt । tatra prakr̥tityayayōranya- tarārthaparityāgē'vaśyakarttavyē saṁkhyāyāḥ saṁkhyēyaguṇabhūtatvād ‘guṇē tvanyāyyakalpanaikadēśatvāt’ iti nyāyēna prātipadikārthā- sambhavinō bahutvasyāvivakṣitatvādudgātr̥śrutisaṁyōgādudgātr̥camasē ēka ēvōdgātā bhakṣayēditi । athavā pāśamantraprakaraṇē bahutvaṁ na kēnacitprakārēṇāstītyavivakṣā yuktā । iha tu prakaraṇē r̥tvijō bahavaḥ santyēva । śaknōti cōdgātr̥śabda ēkakarmasambandhadvārēṇa tān bhakṣayitum । atō lakṣaṇāyāmupapadyamānāyāṁ nāvivakṣā bahutvasyēti udgātr̥śabdasya sarvartviksaṁyōgāt sarva ēva bhakṣayēyuḥ । taduktaṁ sūtrakr̥tā—‘sarvē vā saṁyōgāt’ (3. 5. 24) iti ।

athavā śrutivr̥ttau sambhavantyāṁ lakṣaṇāyā ayōgāt । sambhavati cātrōdgāyantītyudgānasaṁyōgādudgānaśabdābhidhēyāstrayaḥ— udgātā prastōtā pratiharttā cēti । tēna subrahmaṇyasya gānayōgābhāvā- ttadvivarjitāstraya ēva bahutvasaṁyōgādbhakṣayēyuḥ । taduktaṁ sūtrakārēṇa- ‘tatsaṁyōgādvahuśrutēḥ’ iti । tasmādasubrahmaṇyāstraya ēva stōtrakāri- ṇō bhakṣēyuriti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyugānanimittō'yamudgātr̥śabdastē- pu vartitumarhati । tathāhi—ēka ēvōdgātā dvau gātārau । gānaṁ hi
lōkavēdasādhāraṇaṁ gītimātram । udgānantu dvitīyā sāmnō bhaktirutpūrvasyaḥ gāyatērarthaḥ । taccaika ēvōdgātā karōti । gānamātraṁ prastōtr̥pratihartārau । tēna gānayōgasyāvyāpitvānna tannimittatvam । vēdasaṁyōganimitta ēvāyaṁ chandōgapravacanaṁ hyaudgātraśabdēnābhidhīyatē । tēna yē tasyōdgātāra iti audamēdhinyāyēnānumīyantē chandōgapravaca- nāt sahasubrahmaṇyāścatvāra ēvēti, ta ēva bhakṣayantīti siddham ।

prayōjaman—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—sarva ēva sasubrahmaṇyāścha- ndōgāḥ pravacanavēdasaṁyōgāt bhakṣayēyuḥ । yatra tu “viniṣadya udgātāraḥ sāmnā stuvanti” ityādau subrahmaṇyavarjitānāṁ stōtrakāriṇāṁ grahaṇam, tatra subrahmaṇyastōtrasaṁyōgābhāvaḥ kāraṇam । sa hi subrahmaṇyāmr̥caṁ kr̥tvaiva karmadēśānnirgataḥ । tadidamuktam—kāraṇā- dēkadēśē syāditi । na caitadyuktam । audamēdhinyāyasyāvēṣṭyadhikaraṇa ēva nirākr̥tatvāt । tatra hi udamēdhipītō udamēdha ityanuśāsanā- bhāvēna audamēdhyudamēghayōḥ pramāṇāntaraprasiddhatvādbhavatu yathā- kathañcit prakr̥tyanumānam । iha cōdgātr̥tvasyāprasiddhatvādyathānu- śāsanamēva śabdārthō'nugantavyaḥ । smaranti cōdgāturidamityaṇpratyayaṁ, na tu tasya kartēti pratyayalōpam । atō na yuktamētadityanyathā vyākhyāyatē । tathāhi—yathā jātinimittō rājā tadyōgādrājyam । tadyōgādbrāhmaṇādiṣu gauṇō rājaśabdaḥ, tathātrāpi varaṇanimitta
ēvōdgātā, tatsaṁyōgāt pravacanamaudgātram । tadyōgācca prastōtrādiṣu caturṣvapi gauṇa ēvōdgātr̥śabdaḥ । tatra caturṇāmēva bhakṣaṇē prāptē subrahmaṇasya sadapi antarvēdyāñca bhakṣaṇakālē sannidhānābhāvāttad- vyatiriktā ēva bhakṣayēyuḥ । na cāyaṁ karttr̥saṁskāraḥ, yēna yatra subrahmaṇyō'sti tatraiva nītvā dīyēta । śēṣasaṁskārō hyasau । tasya ca taditarabhakṣaṇēnāpi siddhatvādbahuvacanañca kapiñjalanyāyēna triṣvēva caritārthamiti ।
sūtrantu—sarva ēvōdgātr̥śabdēnābhidhīyantē, na stōtrakāriṇa ēva, tēṣāmapyasannidhānātkāraṇādēkadēśē subrahmaṇyavarjitōdgātr̥tr̥tīyē bhakṣaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṁ grāvastutassōmabhakṣādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: jyōtiṣṭōmē grāvastunnāmā hōtr̥puruṣaḥ । tatra sandēhaḥ—kiṁ sa sōmaṁ bhakṣayēduta nēti । samākhyānimittaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ nirūpyēdānīṁ vācanikamēva bhakṣaṇaṁ nirūpyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—na tāvad grāvastutō bhakṣaṇapratipādakaṁ
viśēṣavacanamasti । nāpi “yathācamasamanyāṁścamasāṁścamasinō bhakṣa- yanti, athaitasya hāriyōjanasya sarva ēva lipsantē” iti sāmānya- vacanēna hāriyōjanapātrē grāvastutō'pi bhakṣaṇaprāptiḥ, tasya camasimātrabhakṣaṇavidhāyakatvāt । tathāhi—ēkamidaṁ vākyaṁ pratīyatē । asyārthaḥ—yathācamasamanyāṁścamasānēkaikaṁcamasinō bhakṣa- yanti, athaitasmin hāriyōjanē sarva ēva camasinō bhakṣayantīti । tasmāt svavākyāvagatacamasiviśēṣitatvāt sarvaśabdasya na r̥tviṅmātraviṣayatvam । atō nāsti grāvastutō bhakṣa iti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi camasibhiḥ sarvaśabdasyārthō viśēṣyēta । tathāhi—sarvatraivāyaṁ sarvaśabdō'dhikāraviśēṣitō na viśēṣāntaramapēkṣatē । yathā asmin bhōjyē sarvē bhuktavanta iti । adhikr̥tāśca sarva ēva r̥tvijaḥ । atastairēvāyaṁ nirākāṅkṣaḥ sarvaśabdō na viśēṣaṇāntaramapēkṣatē । na ca camasipadasyārthavatvāya camasibhiḥ sarvaśabdasyārthō viśēṣyata iti vācyam । tasyōbhayathāpi hāriyōjanaśrutyarthatayaivārthavatvāt, śrutisaṅkōcaprasaṅgācca । tadayaṁ
vacanārthaḥ—yathācamasamanyāṁścamasāṁścamasinō bhakṣayanti, hāriyōjanē punaḥ sarva ēvartvijaścamasinō'camasinaśca bhakṣayantīti । atō'sti hāriyōjanē grāvastutō'pi bhakṣa iti siddham ।
sūtrantu—sarvēṣāmēva r̥tvijāṁ hāriyōjanē bhakṣavidhānādasti grāvastutō'pi bhakṣaḥ । camasiśrutistu hāriyōjanastutyarthā na tu sarvaśabdaviśēṣaṇārthēti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṁ vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p: atha kiṁ samākhyaiva bhakṣaṇē kāraṇam ? nēti brūmaḥ । vaṣaṭkārācca bhakṣayēt । vaṣaṭkāraśca bhakṣaṇanimittam । katham ? ēvaṁ hi śrūyatē—“vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” iti । atra prāpta- bhakṣaṇānuvādēna prathāmyamātraṁ vidhīyatē, athavā vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṁ prāthamyaviśiṣṭaṁ bhakṣaṇāntaramiti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣiṇō'bhisandhiḥ—sarvatra viśiṣṭavidhigauravabhayē-
nōpapadasaṅkāntō vidhirdhātvarthasya vilambinīmapi yathākathañcitprāpti- mapēkṣatē । asti ca hōturvaṣaṭkarttr̥tvāt “praitu hōtuścamasaḥ” iti samākhyayā svacamasē bhakṣaṇaprāptiḥ । atastatraiva samākhyāprāptabhakṣa- ṇānuvādēna vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṁ prāthamyamātraṁ vidhīyatē । tēna vaṣaṭ- karttavyanimittakaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ karttavyamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatēḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyatra samāsānnikr̥ṣya ca bhakṣaṇama- nuvadituṁ śakyatē । tathāhi—na tāvadatra bhakṣaṇamātrānuvādēna prāthamyaṁ vidhīyatē, anyatrāpi prasaṅgāt । kintarhi ? vaṣaṭkartturyō bhakṣa iti vaṣaṭkarttr̥sambandhibhakṣaṇānuvādēna । tathā sati vaṣaṭkarttr̥- sambandhasāpēkṣasya bhakṣaṇasya prāthamyēna saha na samāsaḥ sambhavati, asamarthatvāt । atha prāthamyēna bhakṣaṇasya prādhānyācca ‘bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpēkṣamya samāsaḥ’ ityanuśāsanādvaṣaṭkartusambandhasāpē- kṣamapi bhakṣaṇaṁ prathamapadēna samasyata ityucyatē, tathāpi prāthamyaṁ tāvadbhakṣaṇaguṇabhūtaṁ, tadapi vaṣaṭkāranimittakatvādvaṣaṭkarttr̥bhakṣaṇasya prāthamyaṁ na nimittāntarēṇa । kintarhi ? vaṣaṭkārēṇaiva । tēna vaṣaṭkarttr̥riti sambandhādguṇabhūtasyāpi prāthamyasya sāpēkṣatvāt spaṣṭa ēva samāsadōṣa iti । bhakṣaṇaprāthamyayōrniṣkr̥ṣyānuvadituṁ vidhātuṁ vā'śakyatvād vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prāthamyaviśiṣṭamapūrvamēva bhakṣaṇaṁ
vidhīyata iti । nanu “ēkaṁ sāma tr̥cē kriyatē stōtrīyam” iti samāsāpēkṣaṁ samāsasthāmapyr̥camanūdya tritvavidhānaṁ dr̥ṣṭam, tathā prāthamyavidhānaṁ bhaviṣyati । naitat; tatrāpi samāsārthasyaiva vidhānāt, kintu r̥cāṁ sāmāvyabhicārēṇaiva prāptatvāt tritvasya cāprāptatvāttira/?/tvaparō vidhirityucyatē । iha tu yāvadvaṣaṭkāraṁ bhakṣaṇasyāprāptatvāt samāsārtha ēva vidhēstātparyādbhakṣaṇamēva viśiṣṭaṁ vidhīyatē । tēna vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ hōtrā sarvatra kr̥tvā samākhyānimittakaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ camasē karttavyam । na tu tasyaiva prāthamyamiti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—na kēvalaṁ samākhyayā vaṣaṭkarttā svacamasa ēva bhakṣayēt, kintu vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṁ pātrāntarēṣvapi bhakṣayēditi ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṁ hōmābhiṣavayōrbhakṣanimittatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
aparamapi kāraṇaṁ hōmābhiṣavau । “havirddhānē grāvabhirabhiṣu- tyāhavanīyē hutvā pratyañcaḥ parētya sadasi bhakṣayānta” iti । pūrvaṁ vaṣa-
ṭkāranimittaṁ vācanikaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ pratipādyēdānīṁ hōmābhiṣavanimitta- kamapi vācanikaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ pratipādyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ-sarvatrōpapadasaṅkrāntō vidhirdhātvarthaṁ prāptamanū- dyōpapadārthaṁ vidhattē । asti cātra samākhyāvaṣaṭkārābhyāṁ bhakṣaṇa- prāptiḥ । atastadanuvādēnōpapadārtha ēva vidhātavyaḥ । tatra na tāvaddhōmābhiṣavau । tayōḥ sādhanayōrēva vacanāntaraprāptatvāt । nāpya- bhiṣavādhāratvēna havirdhānaṁ, tasyāpi haviḥsaṁskārādhikaraṇatvēna vacanāntaraprāptatvāt । na vābhiṣavahōmabhakṣaṇānāṁ kramō'bhidhīyatē, arthādēva prāptatvāt । na hyanabhiṣutya hōmaḥ sambhavati । na cānabhiṣu- tasya pratipattirūpaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ sambhavati । na cābhiṣavahōmayōrnirjñā- taprayōjanayōrbhakṣaṇāṅgatvēna vidhānam । ataḥ pāriśēṣyādbhakṣa- ṇādhikaraṇatvēna sada ēva vidhīyatē । na ca bhakṣaṇasya taddēśatvēna tadadhikaraṇatvaprāptiḥ । niyāmakābhāvē satīcchayānyatrāpi sthānē bhakṣaprāptēḥ । tēna niyamārthatvēna sadōvidhānamarthavaditi । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi hōtrādināṁ sadōdēśaparityāgēna karmānuṣṭhānaṁ sambhavati hōtrādināṁ sakalāṅgānuṣṭhānadēśō hi sadaḥ । bhakṣaṇamapyaṅgamēva । ataḥ kathamapyanyadēśē na kriyatē । atastēṣāṁ
tatraiva karmapravr̥ttiniyamāt sadasītyētadapi prāptamēva । atō hōmābhi- ṣavanimittakaṁ bhakṣaṇāntaramēvātra vidhīyata iti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē grahēṣu vaṣaṭkartr̥bhirēva bhakṣayitavyam । siddhāntē tu hōmābhiṣavakartr̥bhirapi grahēṣu bhakṣayitavyam । sūtrantu— hōmābhiṣavābhyāmapi nimittabhūtābhyāṁ bhakṣaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṁ bhakṣaṇanimittasamuccayādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyōtiṣṭōmē śrūyatē—“praitu hōtuścamasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prōdgātr̥̄ṇām” iti । tatraiṣa saṁśayaḥ—kiṁ camasēṣu hōmabhiṣavakarttārō vaṣaṭkarttāraśca bhakṣayēyuḥ ? uta na ? iti । ēvaṁ samākhyādirūpēṣu nimittēṣu satsu naimittikō bhakṣō bhavatīti nirūpyēdānīmētēṣāṁ nimittānāṁ yatra samavāyō bhavati, tatra naimittikō bhakṣaḥ kiṁ vikalpēna syāt ? atha vā samuccayēna ? iti prasaṅgānnirūpyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣiṇō'bhisandhiḥ—naimittikē bhakṣaṇē vikalpa
iti । kutaḥ ? ēkārthatvādbhakṣaṇānām । avaśiṣṭasya havyasya prati- pattirūpaḥ saṁskāraḥ । sa ca sarvēṣāmaviśiṣṭa ityatō vikalpēna bhakṣaḥ syāditi । ēvaṁ prāptē—

ucyatē—na vā/?/vadvikalpaḥ sambhavati । tasyāṣṭadōṣaduṣṭatvēnā- nyāyyatvāt । samuccayastarhi bhakṣāṇāṁ bhaviṣyatīti cēt—sō'pi na sambhavati, ēkārthatvāt । ēkēna nimittēna bhakṣaṇarūpē kr̥tē satītaramya niravakāśatvāt । ataḥ pāriśēṣyādbādhō'bhyupētavyaḥ । tatra kiṁ samākhyānimittō bhakṣaḥ itarayōrvaṣaṭkārahōmābhiṣavanimitta- yōrbhakṣayōrbādhakaḥ syāt ? itarau vā bādhakau ? iti saṁśayē samā- khyānimitta itarayōrbādhakaḥ syāt । kr̥taḥ ? praitu hōtuścamasa iti viśēṣaviṣayatvāt । itarayōśca sāmānyaviṣayatvāt । sāmānyācca viśēṣō balavāniti sa ēva tayōrbādhaka iti । nanvitarayōḥ pratya- kṣōpadiṣṭatvēna balīyasvāt asya ca samākhyayā kalpyamānatvēna daurbalyāttāvēva bādhakau syātāmiti । ucyatē—pratyakṣōpadiṣṭatvēna balīyastvamanayōstathāpi ‘ānarthakyapratihatānāṁ viparītaṁ balābalam’ iti nyāyēna samākhyānimittasyaiva bhakṣaṇasya balīyastvāt sa ēvētarayōrbādhakaḥ syāt । kiñcāvaśyaṁ camasān vihāyānyatra nirava- kāśatvāditarayōśca grahēṣu sāvakāśatvāt sa ēva balīyāniti । tasmāt samastēṣu camasinō bhakṣayēyuriti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
camasēṣu vaṣaṭkarttārō hōmābhiṣavakarttāraśca bhakṣayēṣuḥ bhakṣaṇa- nimittasadbhāvāt । tathāhi ‘vaṣaṭkārācca bhakṣayēt’ ityatra vaṣaṭkā- rasya, ‘hōmābhiṣavābhyāṁ ca’ ityatra hōmābhiṣavayōśca samuditayōrbha- kṣaṇanimittatvamuktam । tacca nimittadvayaṁ camasēṣvapyasti । atō nimittasadbhāvāccamasēṣvapi vaṣaṭkārtr̥̄ṇāñca naimittikō bhakṣaḥ syāditi । kiñca nivarttakaśāstradarśanāt sarvatra nivr̥ttirbhavati । na hi kiñciccamasēṣu vaṣaṭkārahōmābhiṣavanimittasya bhakṣasya nivartta- kaśāstramasti । “praitu hōtuścamasaḥ” ityētadēva nivarttakaṁ bhaviṣyatīti cēt—na; samākhyānimittabhakṣaṇamātraprāptāvēvāsya vyāpārō nānyanivr̥ttau tātparyamasti, tridōṣaduṣṭaparisaṁkhyāprasaṅgāt । nanu ‘praitu hōtuścamasa’ iti viśēṣaviṣayatvēna pravr̥ttatvāditarayōśca sāmānya- viṣayatvāt samākhyānimittakō bhakṣō balavānityuktam । maivam; “vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” ityasyāpi viśēṣaviṣayatvāt । tathāhi— na tāvadvaṣaṭkarttr̥sāmānyaṁ kiñcidasti । vaṣaṭkarttr̥śabdasya kr̥dantatvēna yaugikatvāt yaugikānāñca sannihitaviśēṣavācitvāt । atō vaṣaṭkarttr̥viśēṣanimittatvēna prāthamyaviśiṣṭaṁ naimittikaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ
vidhīyatē । tadapi viśēṣavacanamēvēti samākhyānimittō bhakṣō viśēṣavihitatvāditarayōrvādhaka ityasti । kiñca asati sambhavē sarvatra bādhō'ṅgīkriyatē । tēna cātraikasmin naimittikē bhakṣē kr̥tē itarayōrasambhavō'sti । sōmasya sāvayavatvēna śēṣasadbhāvāt । viśēṣatastiktakaṭukatvādalpaṁ bhakṣayēditi vacanācca । ataḥ pratipattyapē- kṣāyāṁ satyāṁ yāvantō naimittikā bhakṣāstēṣāṁ pratipattiḥ karttavyēti । tasmādbhakṣaṇaśabdā iti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē camasēṣu camasibhirēva bhakṣayitavyam । siddhāntē tu vaṣaṭkārahōmābhiṣavakarttr̥bhirapīti ।

sūtrantu—syādvā camasēṣvapi hōmābhiṣavādinimittō'pi bhakṣaḥ kāraṇasya vacanasya bhāvāt । anirddēśāt, na hi camasināmēva camasēṣu nirddēśaḥ anyēṣāṁ niṣēdhaḥ । camasibhakṣaṇakarttavyatāmātra- vidhāyakatvāt, samākhyāvacanikasyēti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśamēkapātrē hōtuḥ prathamabhakṣādhikaraṇam
saṁśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: atha yatraikasmin pātrē bahavō bhakṣayēyuḥ kastatra kramaḥ ? ēkasmin pātrē bahunāṁ bhakṣaṇē siddhē idānīṁ kēna kramēṇa bhakṣaṇa- miti prasaṅgānnirūpyatē । nanu “vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” iti śrūyatē । vaṣaṭkarttaiva ca hōtā । atō vācanikē hōtuḥ prathamabhakṣaṇē sati kathaṁ sandēhaḥ ? ucyatē—
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣiṇō'bhisandhiḥ—sōmarasastāvadadhvaryōrēva hastē bhakṣaṇasamayē samasti । adhvaryuṇāpi cāsau hōmābhiṣavanimittaṁ bhakṣayitavya ēva । tadyadyadhvaryurhōtrē samarpayēt hōtā ca punaradhvaryavē bhakṣaṇārthaṁ samarpayati, tadā prayōgō vikṣipyēta । taccāśubhāvāpēkṣī prayōgavidhirnānumanyatē । tēna prathamaṁ tāvadadhvaryurēva bhakṣayēt । tataḥ kēna bhakṣayitavyaḥ ? ityapēkṣāyāṁ bhavati vacanam—“vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathama- bhakṣaḥ” iti । tēnādhvaryuvyariktabhakṣaṇāntarāpēkṣamēva vaṣaṭkartturbhajña- ṇaprāthamyamiti । tasmādēkapātrē'nēkēṣu bhakṣayatsu kramāt sannidhila- kṣaṇādadhvaryōrēva prathamaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ pratīyata iti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—

ēvaṁ hi mantraḥ śrūyatē “hōtuścitpūrvē haviradyamāśatē” iti । asyāyamarthaḥ—hōturēva yatpūrvaṁ prathamaṁ adyaṁ adanīyaṁ haviḥ tadagrāvāṇa āśata bhuktavantaḥ । tathā “hōtēva naḥ prathamaṁ pāhi” iti । tasyāpyayamarthaḥ—hōtā yathā naḥ asmāt prathamaṁ pātaiva, tathā tvamapi pāhītyarthaḥ । kiñca “vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” iti bhakṣakartr̥r̥tviṅmātrāpēkṣayaiva prāthamyaṁ pratīyatē, na tat prayōgaprāśubhāvānurōdhēnānyathayituṁ yuktam । tathā nimittakramā- nurōdhādapyayamēvātra naimittikasya bhakṣaṇasya kramō yuktaḥ । prathamaṁ hi hōtā vaṣaṭkarōti, tatō'dhvaryurjuhōti । tasmāddhōtaiva prathamaṁ bhakṣayatīti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—hōtaiva prathamaṁ bhakṣayēt mantravarṇāt tasyaiva prathamaṁ bhakṣaṇapratītēḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha trayōdaśamanujñāpūrvakaṁ bhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
chapter.p:
athaikapātrē sāmō'nēkēna bhakṣyatē । kintatrānujñāpyānanujñāpya vā bhakṣayitavyam ? utānujñāpyaivēti । ayañca sandēhō bhāṣya- kārēṇa “tasmātsōmō nānupahūtēna pēyaḥ” ityasya vacanasya viṣaya-
pradarśanārthaṁ pradarśitaḥ । na tu vicārārtham । pratyakṣē vacanē sati sandēhābhāvāt । tēna sūtramidaṁ vacanagatasyōpahūtapadasyānujñā- rūpārthakathanārthamuttaravicāraviṣayapradarśanārthaṁ cēti bōdhyam ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṁ vaidikamantrēṇānujñāpanādhikaraṇam
saṁśayaḥ
chapter.p: athānujñātēnaiva bhakṣayitavyamiti sthitē kiṁ laukikēna vacanē- nānujñāpayitavyam ? uta vaidikēnēti ?
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapyatrāmnātō mantrassamasti, tathāpi mantrasya pūrvōttarabhāgābhyāmanujñāpanaprakāśananirddhāraṇakāraṇābhāvāt liṅgēnānujñāpanē viniyōktuṁ na śakyata iti laukikēnaiva vacanēnā- nujñāpanaṁ karttavyamityēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyatra mantrādanujñāpanaṁ na pratīyēta । na ca kr̥tsnasya mantrasyānujñāpanāprakāśanādaviniyōgaḥ । sarvatra mantraikadēśasyaiva samavētārthaprakāśanē satītarapadānāṁ tadanukūlatvēnai-
vārthatvāt kr̥tsnamantraviniyōgasyāpyupapattēḥ । bhavati kr̥tsnamantraprayōgē- ṇaiva ca sarvathā vaidikēnaivānujñānaṁ na laukikēnēti siddham ।।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—upahūta upahvayasvētyanēnaiva vaidikēnānujñāpanamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṁ vaidikamantrēṇānujñādānādhikaraṇam
saṁśayaḥ
chapter.p: ētadavagatam—“upahūta upahvayasva” ityanēna anujñāpayēditi । atha prativacanē sandēhaḥ-kiṁ laukikaṁ prativacanam ? utaitadēva ? iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—kr̥tsnasyāpi mantrasyānujñāpanē viniyōgasambhavē- nābhihitatvādanujñāpya prativacanaṁ laukikamēva karttavyam । athavānu- jñānujñāpanayōrmantrayōrliṅgādaviśēṣēṇa pratītērubhayatrāpi kr̥tsna ēvāvr̥ttō mantraḥ prayōktavya iti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdavaṁ yadyatra viśēṣagrahō na bhavēt । tathāhi— samabhivyāhāralakṣaṇādvākyādanyatarabhāgasyānyatarārthatvēnātra prayōgō
vaktavyaḥ । abhidhānasāmarthyālliṅgādupahūta iti pūrvasya mantrabhāga- syānujñāyām, upahvayasvētyuttarasya tu bhāgasyānujñāpanē viniyōgaḥ pratīyatē । tēna liṅgēna vākyaṁ bādhitvōttarasyānujñāyāṁ prayōga iti siddham ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣōḍaśamēkapātrāṇāmanujñāpya bhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
saṁśayaḥ
chapter.p: idaṁ sandihyatē—kiṁ yaḥ kaścidanujñāpayitavyaḥ ? uta samāna- pātra iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—na tāvadatrānujñāpyaḥ kaścidviśēṣarūpēṇa śrūyatē, kintvanujñāpanamātram । anujñāpanēna cānujñāpyamātrākṣēpa iti yēna kēnacidanujñātō bhakṣayēditi । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyētadanujñāpanamatyantāprāptaṁ vidhīyatē । kintu lōkē prāptamēvaitanniyamyatē । lōkē sādhāraṇadravyē viniyōga ēvaṁ pratisambandhicittānukūlanārthamanujñāpanaṁ dr̥ṣṭam । ēkapātrē
sthitaśca sōmō bahūnāṁ sādhāraṇō na bhinnapātrastha iti samānapātrā- ṇāmēvādhikabhakṣaṇāśaṅkayānujñāpanaṁ dr̥ṣṭārthanniyamyata iti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—tadanujñāpanamēkapātrāṇāmēva samavāyāt sādhāraṇatvādityarthaḥ ।
chapter.head: athaṁ saptadaśaṁ svayaṁ yaṣṭurbhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p:
asti jyōtiṣṭōmaḥ । tatra r̥tuyājēṣu śrūyatē—“yajamānasya yājyā sō'bhiprēṣyati—hōtarētadyajēti, svayaṁ vā niṣadya yajati” iti । yadā svayaṁ yajati, tadā sandēhaḥ—kimasya bhakṣō'sti ? nāstīti । atrēyaṁ viṣayaśuddhiḥ—asti jyōtiṣṭōmē r̥tugrahā- bhyāsaḥ । santi ca tatra yājyāḥ । tāśca yadyapi samākhyayā hōtr̥prayōjyā ēva, tathāpyatra yajamānasadasyānāmētatprayōgārthaṁ varaṇam । hōturapanīya cānyairapi tāḥ prayōktavyāḥ । tatra yajamānajyāyāṁ pakṣadvayaṁ vihitam—hōtrē ca pratyarpaṇaṁ, svayaṁ vōccāraṇam । yadā svayaṁ samuccārayati tadā sandēhaḥ—kiṁ vaṣaṭ-
kārō hōtrā karttavyaḥ, tataśca tannimittabhakṣaṇamapi hōtraiva karttavyam ? uta yajamānēnaivēti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—yājyā hi hōtussakāśādvacanēnāpanītā, na tu vaṣaṭkārabhakṣau । na ca yājyāpanayēnaiva vaṣaṭkārabhakṣayōrapyapanayaḥ, tayōryājyātō'rthāntaratvāt । tēna yathā yājyāpanayē'pyarthāntarabhūtaṁ pravaraśabdābhidhēyaṁ varaṇaṁ nāpanīyatē, tathā vaṣaṭkārabhakṣāvapīti । atō yājyāmātrōccāraṇamitarartvigvadyajamānēna karttavyam । vaṣaṭkā- rastannimittañca bhakṣaṇaṁ hōtraivēti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi yājyāpanayē bhakṣaṇakāraṇabhūtō vaṣaṭkārō nāpanīyēta । tathāhi—nātra “yadamānasya yājyā” ityatāvanmātraṁ śrūyatē । kintu “svayaṁ niṣadya yajati” iti । na ca yājyōccāraṇamātrēṇējyatē । kintarhi ? vaṣaṭkāraparyantēna, tasyaiva haviḥpradānārthatvāt । kiñca “anavānaṁ yajati” iti śrūyatē । asya cāyamarthaḥ—yājyā ārabhya yāvadyāgō na samāpyatē, tāvatparyantaṁ vicchēdō na karttavyaḥ । vaṣaṭkārēṇa ca yāgaḥ samāpyatē । tadyadi yājyāṁ prayujya viramēdyajamānastadā prayatnavicchēdamēva kuryāt ।
tasmādvaṣaṭkāraprayōgasya yajamānakarttavyatvāttannimittamēva bhakṣaṇa- mapi yajamānēnaiva karttavyam । yacca varaṇavadbhakṣaṇamapi nāpanīyata ityuktam, tadyuktam; yatō varaṇaṁ khalu ddōturnāpanīyata ityu- citamēva । tasya khalvarthāddhōtari pravr̥ttatvāt । atō yājyāpanayē sati bhakṣaṇaṁ yajamānēnaiva karttavyamiti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—vaṣaṭkārē bhakṣaṇakāraṇasya vaṣaṭkārasya yaṣṭurāgamanāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭādaśaṁ phalacamasādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: jyōtiṣṭōmē śrūyatē—“yadi rājanyaṁ vaiśyaṁ vā yājayēt sa yadi sōmaṁ bibhakṣayiṣēt nyagrōdhastibhinīrāhr̥tya tāssampiṣya dadhanyu- nmr̥jya tamasmai bhakṣaṁ prayacchēnna sōmam” iti । tatra sandēhaḥ—kiṁ phalacamasaḥ sōmabhakṣavikāraḥ ? utējyāvikāraḥ ? iti । prasaktasōmabhakṣaṇānuprasaṅgēnēdānīṁ phalacamasō'pi bhakṣaṇasambandhēna śrūyamāṇō vicāryatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—sōmasya tāvadubhayasambandhaḥ pratīyatē—yāgasa- mbandhō bhakṣaṇasambandhaśca । tatra tāvadyāgasambaddhasya na sōmasyāyaṁ phalacamasō vikāraḥ । yāgasambandhitvēnāsyāśravaṇāt । kiṁ tarhi ? yadi sōmaṁ vibhakṣayiṣēt tataḥ phalacamasamasmai bhakṣaṁ prayacchēditi śrūyērbhakṣaṇasambandhisōmavikāra ēva । tathāhi—paśō śrūyatē— “tryaṅgaiḥ sviṣṭakr̥taṁ yajati” iti । hr̥dayādyēkādaśabhiraṅgaiḥ pradhānabhū- taḥ paśuyāgō nirvarttitaḥ । prakr̥tau ca sānnāyyayāgaśēṣasyaiva sviṣṭakr̥taḥ pratipāditatvādatrāpyēkāśānāmavayavānāṁ madhyē yaiḥ kaiścit tribhi- raṅgairiṣṭaśēṣaiḥ sviṣṭakr̥dyāgaḥ karttavya iti pūrvapakṣayitvā, yāga sambandhāpēkṣasya tritvasyāṅgaiḥ saha samāsāsambhavādēkādaśasu madhyē trayāṇāmavāntarasāmānyamaṅgānāṁ nirddhārayitumaśaktērnayāgaśēṣā- ṇāmupādānam । kintarhi ? “dōṣṇō dakṣiṇasya pūrvārddhādagnayē samavadyati, gudasya madhyataḥ śrōṇyā jaghanataḥ” ityēkēnāpyuddēśēna sambandhātīra/?/ṇyavadhāritāni । tairēva viśēṣaiḥ sviṣṭakr̥dyāgaḥ karttavya iti siddhāntitam । tēna yathā śarairbarhiṣāṁ vikāraḥ, tathēhāpījyāśēṣāṇāmanijyāśēṣairvikāra iti । taduktaṁ sūtrakr̥tā— ‘tryaṅgairvā śaravadvikāraḥ syāta’ (jai. sū., 10. 7. 11.) iti । atō- 'trāyanijyāśēṣēṇa phalacamasēnējyāśēṣasya sōmasya vikārō na
virōtstyatē । ēvañca satyutpattiśiṣṭaḥ sōmaḥ pradhānakarmaṇi yāgē bādhitō na bhaviṣyati । ‘na sōmam’ ityarthaprāptabhakṣaṇagatasōmanivr̥tya- nuvādēnaiva bādhādatrāpyupapatsyata iti ।

yē tvārādupakārakaṁ phalacamasasādhanaṁ bhakṣaṇaṁ vidhīyata iti pūrvapakṣayanti, taiśca pūrvapakṣavārttikākṣarāṇyanākalitāni । na cāyaṁ pakṣō yuktyāpi saṅgacchatē, anēkadōṣaduṣṭatvāt । tathāhi—phalacamasāntaṁ bhakṣaṁ prayacchēditi viniyōgabhaṅgi ? na bhakṣaṇaṁ kuryāditi । tathā sōmabhakṣaṇasya phalacamasēnātulya- kāryatvēnānivarttitatvānna sōmamiti nāyamarthaprāptānuvādaḥ । niṣēdhaparatvē ca vākyabhēdaḥ । vihitasōmabhakṣaṇapratiṣēdhādvāṣṭa- dōṣaduṣṭavikalpāpattiḥ । tathā adr̥ṣṭakalpānādayaśca dōṣā apyabhihitāḥ । siddhāntasamayē pakṣavikalpamātrēṇa yaccintitaṁ tadēvātra tāḥ pūrvapakṣīkr̥tamityupēkṣaṇīyamēvēti । tasmādbhakṣaśrutisaṁyō- gādrājanyavaiśyanimittakaḥ phalacamasō bhakṣavikāra iti । ēvaṁ prāptē- 'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi pūrvapakṣē phalacamasaḥ pratipatti- sambandhārhō bhavēt । dvividhaṁ hi dravyamākārṇakaramiti pratipatti-
mapēkṣatē । kr̥taprayōjanatvādyathā sōmarasaḥ purōḍāśō vā । prayō- janārthōpādānanāntarīyakōpādānatvāt yathā “tryaṅgai sviṣṭakr̥ yajati” ityādiṣutryaṅgādi । na ca pūrvapakṣē phalacamasaḥ kr̥taprayōjanaḥ । nāpi prayōjanārthōpādānanāntarīyakōpādāna iti pratipatyapēkṣā- bhāvānna pratipattisambandhō ghaṭatē । tryaṅgasya tu paśuyāgārthōpātta- paśunāntarīyakōpādānasyākīrṇakaratvēna pratipatyapēkṣāyāṁ vacanābhāvē puruṣēcchādhīnā yā kācit pratipattirbhavēt । vacanasadbhāvē tu yathāvacanamēva pratipattirbhavati । tēna yāgīyadravyasaṁskārabhakṣaṇa- sambandhānyathānupapatyā phalacamasasya sōmavadavaśyaṁ yāgasādhanatvaṁ kalpanīyam । tatrāpi “sa yadi sōmaṁ vibhakṣayiṣēt” iti yajamāna- sambandhibhakṣaṇakīrttanādyāvatttryaṅgē'nupayujyamānō yajamānabhakṣaṇasaṁ- skāraḥ pratipadyēta, tāvataiva yajñabhāgēnārthāpatyā sambandha iti yajamā- nacamasa ēva sōmaṁ vikarōti, na grahacamasāntarēṣviti sthitam । naimittikatvādutpattiśiṣṭasōmabādhō'pi na dōṣaḥ । ēvañca sati krayābhiṣavādisaṁskr̥tēnaiva yaṣṭavyamityanyatra pādē pratipādanīyam । ēvaṁ “yadi sōmaṁ na vindēt pūtīkānabhiṣuṇuyāt” ityatrāpi sōmābhāvē sōmasambandhinō'bhiṣavarūpasaṁskārasya pūtīkēṣu darśanāt pūtīkānāṁ yāgasādhanatvamētēnaiva nyāyēnāvagantavyam ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē yajamānasya camasē'pi sōmēnaiva yaṣṭavyam ।
bhakṣaṇamātrantu phalacamasasya । siddhāntē tu phalacamasēnaiva yaṣṭavyam । sūtrantu—ijyāyāṁ phalacamasēna sōmasya vikārēṇa bhakṣaṇamātraṁ saṁskārasya bhakṣaṇarūpasya tadarthatvāta yāgasādhanadravyārthatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikōnaviṁśāmanuprasarpyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti rājasūyaḥ । tatra śrūyatē—“śataṁ brāhmaṇāḥ sōmaṁ bhakṣayanti, daśa daśaikaikaṁ camasamanuprasarpēyuḥ” iti । tatra rājanya- camasē sandēhaḥ—kiṁ rājanyā anuprasarpēyuḥ ? uta brāhmaṇāḥ ? rājanyacamasē phalacamasō rājanyēna bhakṣayitavya iti nirūpitam । idānīṁ kvacit kr̥tiviśēṣē tadapavādaḥ kriyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—vākyadvayamētat । “śataṁ brāhmaṇāḥ sōmaṁ bhakṣayanti” ityēkam । “daśa daśaikaikaṁ camasamanuprasarpēyuḥ” ityaparam । tatra bhakṣayantīti vartamānarūpatvāt pūrvapasyāvidhāyakatvāduttarasya cānuprasarpēyurityanupahataśaktividhyākhyātasambandhādvidhāyakatvamēva ।
nanvēvaṁ satyayamasya vākyasyārthaḥ—yē bhakṣaṇārthamēkaikaṁ camasamanupra- sarpanti, tē daśa daśa prasarpantīti viśiṣṭānuvādvādvākyaṁ bhidyēta । maivam; anuprasarpaṇīyakarmaviśēṣarahitāyā anuprasarpaṇakriyāyāḥ kartturuddēśyatvāyōgāt । tēna yathaiva.............sambhavāddhavirviśēṣi- tāyā ēvōddēśyatvaṁ, tathēhāpi prasarpaṇakriyāmātrasya sāmānyarūpasyō- ddēśyapratītyayōgyatvāt prasarpaṇīyakarmaviśēṣaviśēṣitāyā ēva karttā daśasaṁkhyāvidhāvuddēśya iti ।

nanvēvaṁ kriyāntarārthamapi yē camasamanusarpanti tēṣāmapi daśatvaṁ syāt । bhakṣaṇārthamiti viśēṣaṇē tu sa ēva viśiṣṭānuvādō dōṣaḥ । maivam; camasamityētāvataiva bhakṣaṇāprāptēḥ । tathāhi— camyatē'sminniti camasaḥ । tēna camasapadādēva bhakṣaṇasya prāptatvādbha- kṣaṇārthamēvānusarpaṇāvagatēstadarthakr̥taviśēṣaṇavivakṣā । na ca ēkaikamiti pr̥thagvivakṣaṇīyam । tathābhūtasyaiva prakr̥titaḥ prāptatvāt । na ca prāptē karmaṇi daśa daśēti daśatvasyārthasya ca vidhānādvākyabhēda iti vaktavyam । pratipradhānāvr̥ttinyāyēna praticamasaṁ daśatvaprāptēścānu- vādāt । tēnātra daśatvasaṁkhyāmātraṁ vidhīyatē । anyat sarvamanūdyatē । ēvañca sati praticamasaṁ yathāprāptabhakṣaṇānvayāddaśatvasya rājanyacamasē rājanyatvasyēva prāptatvāt saṁkhyāyāścamasāntaravr̥ttitvāt rājanyacamasē rājanyā ēva daśa bhakṣayanti । tathā ca sati “śataṁ brāhmaṇāḥ sōmaṁ
bhakṣayanti” iti pūrvavākyē praticamasaṁ daśatvavidhiḥ avayavaśiṣṭatvā- cchatamityanuvādaḥ ।

tathā brāhmaṇā iti brāhmaṇabhūyastvēna brahmaṇapadamanu- vādaḥ । rājanyacamasē ca yadyapi phalacamasō'sti na sōmaḥ, tathāpi sōmabhūyastvāt sōmamiti sōmaphalacamasayōranuvādaḥ । bhakṣayantītyanirdēśaprāptamēvānūdyatē । na ca sarvānuvādē daśadaśagrahaṇaṁ vyarthamiti । daśagrahaṇasyaivānarthakatvāttatrānuprasarpaṇakarttr̥pu daśatvaṁ vidhīyamānamēkakālīnatvādrājanyānāmēva । atō rājanyā ēva rājanyacamasē bhakṣayēyuriti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdyadi “śataṁ brāhmaṇāḥ sōmaṁ bhakṣayanti” ityētadapi vākyaṁ vidhāyakaṁ na bhavēt । tathāhi—agatyā khalu sarvānuvādō bhavati । tatrāpi brāhmaṇēṣu lakṣaṇayā brāhmaṇaśabdasya vr̥ttirityētadapyagatyā svīkarttavyam । na cātra vidhiśabdō nāsti । bhakṣayantītyētasya pañcamalakāratvēna vidhitvōpapattēḥ । atō mukhya ēvātra brāhmaṇaśabdārthō vidhīyatē । na ca prāpta- bhakṣaṇānuvādēna brāhmaṇavidhānēna ca vākyabhēda iti vācyam । uttaravākyavihitapraticamasadaśatvavidhisāmarthyēnaiva pracayaśiṣṭaprāpta-
tvāt । anuvādē ca brāhmaṇamātravidhānāt । sōmamiti ca yāgasādhanalakṣaṇayā sōmaphalacamasayōrēvānuvādaḥ । na ca saṁkhyāyāḥ samānarūpāyā vr̥ttitvādarthata ēva rājanyajātīyaśabdō- 'pyavadhāritatvādrājanyacamasē brāhmaṇyōnavakāśa iti vācyam । yata ēkaikaṁ camasamanuprasarpantīti camasapadōpasthāpitabhakṣaṇakriyā- vadvēdēnaiva daśasaṁsthāvagamōpapattēḥ । ataḥ kiṁjātīyāstē bhakṣakā ityapēkṣāyāṁ yāvacchutī rājanyakalpanārthaṁ prakramatē, tāvatpratyakṣa- śrutivihitairbrāhmaṇairēva nairākāṅkṣyaṁ kriyata iti na rājanyāma- vakāśaḥ । tēna rājanyacamasē'pi brāhmaṇā ēva daśa bhakṣayēyuriti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—rājanyacamasē'pi brāhmaṇā ēva bhakṣayēyuḥ । tulyēna brāhmaṇaśabdēna sarvacamasēṣu brāhmaṇāvidhā- nāditi ।।

lg.l: yō nāma kaścidiha saṁvidita pramēyaṁ granthāntarē likhati vā vadati svayaṁ vā ।
matkarttr̥tāmananukīrttya sa kīrtilōpāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāta ।।

chapter.head: atha tr̥tīyādhyāyasya ṣaṣṭhaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṁ anārabhyādhītānāṁ prakr̥tigāmitvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: anārabhya kiñcit śrūyatē—“yasya khādiraḥ snuvō bhavati chandasāmēva rasēnāvadyati, sarasā asyāhutayōḥ bhavanti । yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṁ ślōkaṁ śr̥ṇōti” ityēvamādi । tatra sandēhaḥ—kiṁ khādirādi prakr̥tau vikr̥tau ca niviśatē ? uta prakr̥tāvēvēti । suvarṇabharaṇādārabhyānārabhyavādādivicārē prastutē prasaṅgāt sarvapradānavicārataḥ prabhr̥ti śēṣaviṣayavicāraṁ parisamāpyēdānīṁ sa ēvānārabhyavādaḥ prastutō vicāryatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—atra śrutyādipramāṇābhāvē'pi khādira- tāparṇatādīnāṁ kratusambandhastāvadaśvapratigrahēnyānyēna siddhaḥ । yatra vyabhicaritaḥ kratusambandhaḥ, tasyāpyaśvadānasyēva yathā- kathañcitkratūpasthitimātrēṇa kratusambandhāpādakatvam, tatrāvyabhi- caritakratusambandhānāṁ sruvādīnāṁ sutarāmēva kratusambandhāpāda- katvam । ataścōpadēśātidēśābhyāṁ prakr̥tikr̥tisādhāraṇyāt prakr̥ti- vikr̥tyarthatvamēvānārabhyaśrutānāṁ yuktam ।

nanu khādiratādividhānārthapragratō vikr̥tāvātidēśikī sruvādiprāptirvaktavyā । atidēśēnaiva sruvādivat khādira- tādirapi vikr̥tau prāpnōtīti tadvidhānē dviruktidōṣaḥ syaditi । ucyatē—syādēvaṁ yadi vikr̥tiṁ vihāva khādiratādyupadēśaḥ prathamaṁ prakr̥tigāmī bhūtvā caramaṁ vikr̥tigāmī bhavēt । sa hi sruvādimukhēna kratupravēśaprabhilaṣan sruvādiprāpti- mātramapēkṣatē । sruvādināñca yathā prakr̥tau prāptirupadēśāttathā vikr̥tāvapyasti । na ca sruvādināmatidēśa ēvānārabhyādhīta- khādiratāyāḥ prakr̥tisambandhamantarēṇa na bhavatīti vācyam । ēvaṁ hi manyatē pūrvapakṣī—yadyapyupakāradvārēṇābhi/?/dēśataḥ prāptiriti daśamādyē sthāsyati, tathāpyupakārasya pratipādarthamēva vilakṣaṇa- tvāttadvārēṇa prāptirbhavantī pratyēkamēva bhavati । sā ca yāvadanārabhya- vādaḥ khādiratādividhānārthaṁ prakr̥tivikr̥tigatasruvānirikṣaṇaṁ kurutē, tādavadupakārakākāṅkṣāvaśādagrata ēva pravr̥ttēti khādiratāvyati- rēkēṇaiva sruvasyāpyagratō vikr̥tau prāptatvādbhavati sruvadvārēṇa prakr̥ti- vikr̥tisādhāraṇa ēva khādiratāvidhiriti । tēnāprakaraṇādhītaṁ khādiratādi prakr̥tivikr̥tyarthamēvēti । ēva prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi pratyēkamupakārātidēśō bhavēt । kintu kathamiti mahōpakāragatēyamākāṅkṣā'tidēśakāraṇaṁ prakr̥tigata- mahāpakārasambandhapratipādakamēva prakr̥tivacchabdaṁ kalpayitvā tadvārēṇa padārthasambandhaṁ vikr̥tau karōti, na tu pratyēkōpakārātidēśadvārēṇa । tathā satyanēkavākyakalpanādōṣāt । mahōpakārāvagatiḥ prakr̥tāva- pūrvasyānirjñātōpāyaparimāṇatvāt śrutismr̥tyācāraparyantanirikṣaṇēna paryavasyati, naupadēśikapadārthamātrēṇa । tatkathamanārabhyaśrutivihitaṁ sruvaprakr̥tibhūtaṁ khādiratvamanāsādyaiva mahōpakārāvagatipayavasānam ? aparyavasitāyāñca mahōpakārāvagatau kutō'tidēśatō mahōpakāraprāptiḥ ? kutastarāṁ tatpr̥ṣṭhabhāvēna sruvādiprāptiriti । taduktam—

lg.l: tata ēvaṁ bhavēdēṣa yugapattu pravarttatē ।। iti ।

chapter.p:
tēnāvaśyamagratō mahōpakārē satyēva prakr̥tāvanārabhyavihitakhā- diratvādividhānāya dvārabhūtānāṁ sruvādināmatidēśataḥ prāptimabhi- dadhatāvaśyaṁ khādiratvādiprāptirapyatidēśata ēva vaktavyā । tathā sati durnivārō dviruktidōṣaḥ । yēṣāṁ tu vikr̥tāvapyatidēśata ēva dvāraprāptiḥ, tēṣāṁ tvanārabhyavādā api prakr̥tivikr̥tyarthā ēva । yathā “/?/yē juhvati” ityanārabhyavi/?/hita ēvāhavanīyaḥ sarvāsvēva
juhōtyutpattiṣu yugapadēva sambadhyatē । tasmāt prakr̥tyartha ēva khādiratvādividhiriti siddham ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē khādiratvādīnāmupadiṣṭatvāviśēṣēṇa tadvaiguṇyē prakr̥tau vikr̥tau ca prāyaścittasāmyam । siddhāntē tūpadi- ṣṭādiṣṭayōrvaiguṇyē prāyaścittaviśēṣa iti । sūtrantu—prakr̥tāvēva khādiratādinivēśaḥ, na vikr̥tau dviruktidōṣāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṁ anārabhyādhītasyāpi vikr̥tigāmitādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p: anārabhya kiñcit sāmidhēnīnāṁ parimāṇamāmnātam— “saptadaśa sāmidhēnīranubrūyāt” iti । tatra sandēhaḥ—kimēta- tprakr̥tai niviśatē ? uta vikr̥tāviti । idānīmanārabhya śrutānāṁ prakr̥tigāmitvamapōdyatē ।

atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi pāñcadaśyaṁ prakaraṇē śrūyatē— tathāpyānārabhya śrutasyāpi sāptadaśyasya pūrvādhikaraṇōktanyāyēna prakr̥tyarthatvāt sāmidhēnyanuvacanādēkakaryatvēna sāptadaśyapāñcadaśya-
yōrvikalpa ēvēti । nanvanārabhyavādēna sāptadaśasya sāmidhēnyanu- vacanadvārēṇa tatsambandhikratumātrasambandhō'vagamyatē । prakaraṇēna ca kratuviśēṣasambandhaḥ । tēna viśēṣēṇa sāmānyasya bādhāt kutō vikalpaḥ ? syādēvaṁ yadi vākyamēva kratuviśēṣasambandhaṁ pratipādayēt । na tvētadasti । dvayōrēva vākyayōstulyarūpatvāt । kintu prakaraṇēna viśēṣasambandhō vaktavyaḥ । tacca vākyaddurbalam । tēna yāvatpra- karaṇēna viśēṣasambandhaḥ kriyatē, tāvadvākyadvayēna tulyabalēna sāptadaśyapāñcadaśyayōḥ prakr̥tau vikalpa ēvāvadhāryata iti । taduktam—
tasmāt sāptadaśyamapi prakr̥tyarthamēvēti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyarabhyaśrutānārabhyaśrutavākyayōstu- lparūpatvaṁ bhavēt । tathāhi—pāñcadaśyaṁ prakaṇēna labdhāpūrva- sambandhaṁ vākyēna vidhīyamānamapūrvōyānapūrvīyayōḥ sambandhāsa- mbhavādapūrvasāmānyalakṣaṇayā'pūrvīyasāmidhēnīsambandhēnaiva vidhāyatē । sāptadaśyaṁ tvānārabhyaśruta/?/ /?/thamamalabdhāpūrvasambandhēnaiva vākyēna vidhāyatē । ataśca khādiratādivadānarthakyaparihārāya sāmidhēnya-
vyabhicārōpasthitēnāpūrvēṇa sambadhyatē । na sāmidhēnīsvarūpasambandhā- viśēṣē'pi prakaraṇaśrutaṁvākyam । tattvapūrvīyasāmidhēnīsambaddhamēva pāñca- daśyaṁ vidadhāti । anārabhya śrutantu sāmidhēnīsvarūpasambandhamēva sāptadaśyaṁ vidadhāti । paścāttu tadupapattyarthaṁ kratvapūrvasambandha iti । ataḥ prathamaṁ pāñcadaśyāvaruddhē kratau sāptadaśyasyānavakāśātkutō vikalpaḥ ? taduktam—

nanu prakr̥tāvanavakāśasya sāptadaśyasya kā tarhi gatiḥ ? vikr̥- tāviti cēt—na; tatrāpi prakr̥tivadatidēśaprāptasya sāmidhēnyanuva- canasya pāñcadaśyāvaruddhatvēna sāptadaśyapravēśāsambhavāt । tēnāna- rthakyapratihatānāṁ viparītaṁ balābalamiti nyāyēna prakr̥tāvēva vikalpē- nāsyā nivēśō'bhyupētavya iti । ucyatē—syādēvaṁ yadi mitra- vindādhvapakalpāsu vikr̥tiṣu sāptadaśyasyāvakāśō na bhavēt । tāsu khalu prakaraṇaśrutamēva sāmidhēnīsāptadaśyamasti । atastēnāti- diṣṭasya pāñcadaśyasya bādhitatvādbhavati । sāptadaśyasyāvakāśa iti । na ca prakaraṇaśrutēnaiva sāptadaśyavidhānādasya vaiphalyamiti vācyam । utpattiviniyōgābhyāṁ bhēdēnārthavatvāt । anārabhyaśrutēna hi
vākyēna sāptadaśyaṁ sāmidhēnīsambandhēnōtyāditam । prakaraṇa- śrutivākyēna ca kratuviśēṣasambandhēna viniyujyata iti kimanu- papannam ?
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu-prakaraṇaviśēṣātpāñcadaśyasya kratuviśēṣasambandhāviśēṣatadvirōdhisāptadaśyaṁ vikr̥tau mitravindā- dhvarakalpāsu bhavēditi ।।
chapter.head: aya tr̥tīyaṁ naimittikasāptadaśyādēḥ prakr̥tyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p:
darśapūrṇamāsayōrāmnātam—“bhō/?/dōhanēna paśukāmasya praṇayēt” iti । tathāgnīṣōmīyē paśau śrūyatē —“bailvō brahmavarcasakāmēna karttavya” iti । ēvañjātīyakēṣu sandēhaḥ—kiṁ prakr̥tau nivēśaḥ ? uta vikr̥tau ? iti । anārabhyaśrutānāṁ yathākramaṁ prakr̥tyarthatvaṁ pratipādyēdānīmārabhyaśrutānāmēva prakr̥tyarthatvamadhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇēna prasaṅgāt pratipādyatē । atra yadyapi sūtrē naimittakasyaiva vicāraḥ । asti ca prakr̥tau naimittikaṁ sāmidhēnīsāptadaśyam—“saptadaśa
vaiśyasya” iti tadapi vicāraṇīyamēva, tathāpi tulyanyāyatayā pūrvapakṣasaukaryēṇa bhāṣyakārēṇa kāmyamēvōdāhr̥tya vicāritam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—ārabhyaśrutānāmapi gōdōhana bailvādīnāṁ svavākyōpāttaphalasaṁyōgānna tāvatprakaraṇagrahaṇamasti । tasyā- saṁyuktagrāhitvāt । kiñca kāmyānāṁ gōdōhanādīnāṁ prakr̥tau pravēśaḥ prakaraṇāvagatakratvaṅgabhūtacamasādibādhēna vaktavyaḥ । tathā ca sati kratōrēva vaiguṇyātkratuphalasiddhistāvannāsti । nāpi viguṇa- kratusambandhinō guṇātphalamiti । taduktam—

lg.l: kratvarthāṅgaprahāṇō hi na syāttasya kratōḥ phalam ।
guṇācca na phalaṁ sidhyēdviguṇaṁ kratusāśritāt ।। iti ।

chapter.p:
api ca yadapi gōdōhanādīnāṁ praṇayanādi sādhyaṁ tasya cōtpattiśiṣṭacamasādinirākāṅkṣatvānna gōdōhanādisambandhō vaktuṁ śakyatē । atō na tāvadēṣāṁ prakr̥tau pravēśaḥ sambhavati । nanvanēnaiva hētunā vikr̥tāvapi pravēśō na sambhavati । atidiṣṭacamasādi- virōdhasya tatrāpyaviśiṣṭatvāt । ucyatē—satyamēvaṁ, tathāpyasti viśēṣaḥ । prakr̥tau khalūpadiṣṭapadārthānusārēṇōpakārō vidhinā svīkr̥taḥ । tēnāsāvupadiṣṭacamasādiparityāgēna na phalārthōpadiṣṭa- gōdōhanādisādhyāmupakārasiddhimanumanyatē । vikr̥tau tūpakārāva-
dhāraṇapurassaramaṅgāvadhāraṇam । upakārasya ca puruṣārthēnāpi gōdō- hanēna sidhyaviśēṣādupēkṣata ēvātidēśikamaṅgamiti bādhakasaukaryā- dvikr̥tyanvaya ēva kāmyānāmiti । ēvaṁ naimittikasyāpi nityāvaru- ddhatvātprakr̥tāvapravēśādētēnaiva nyāyēna bādhakasaukaryāvagamamātrē cama- sō vihitaḥ । gōdāhanantu prāptē camasē paśukāmakarttr̥kaprayōgaviśēṣē vihitaṁ pūrvaprāptasāmānyavihitādbalavattaramiti vyavasthitam ।

kiñca nityabhūtaścamasaḥ paśukāmavyatiriktaprayōgē'pi sāvakāśaḥ । gōdōhanantu paśukāmaprayōgaikaviṣayamiti niravakāśam । sāvakāśācca niravakāśaṁ balīya ityapi sthitam । tathā kratvarthō hi camasaḥ । sa ca paramparayā kratūpakārakadvārēṇa puruṣārthasambaddhaḥ । gōdōhanañca svavākyōpāttēnaiva paśurūpapuruṣārthēna sambaddham । viprakr̥ṣṭaphalācca sanni- kr̥ṣṭaphalaṁ balavattaramityapi vyavasthitam । tēna viśēṣavihitatvā- danyatrānavakāśatvātpratyāsannapuruṣārthatvādgōdōhanaṁ sāmānyavihitaṁ sāvakāśaṁ viprakr̥ṣṭaphalaṁ camasaṁ bādhata ēvēti । taduktam—

ataḥ kāmyanaimittikayōrapi nityabādhēna prakr̥tāvēva nivēśō- papattērna vikr̥tigamanam । nanvēvaṁ sati kratvarthacamasabādhēna kratōrvai- guṇyānna kratuphalasiddhiḥ । nāpi viguṇakratusambandhinō gōdōha- nātphalamityuktam । ataḥ kathaṁ camasabādha iti । ucyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi kratvarthamēva praṇayanaṁ gōdōhanaṁ nāśrayēt । tathāhi—gōdōhanēna praṇayēditi viśiṣṭavidhigauravabhiyā viśēṣaṇībhūtagōdōhanasaṅkrāntō- 'yaṁ vidhiḥ praṇayanānuvādamapēkṣatē । sannihitañca camasasādhyaṁ kratvarthaṁ praṇayanamasti । atastadēvāśrayamāsādya dadhnēndriyādhikaraṇanyāyēna phalē guṇavidhiḥ paryavasyati । tēna camasasādhyasya kratvarthasyaiva praṇayanasya gōdōhanēnāśritatvānna kratōrvaiguṇyama । nāpi guṇasya viguṇakratusambandhitvam । tēna dvayōrēva phalasādhanatvamavyāhr̥tam । atō yadyapyutpattiśiṣṭacamasanirākāṅkṣaṁ praṇayanaṁ gōdōhanamapēkṣatē tathāpi gōdōhanamēva phalasādhanamagatyā prakr̥taṁ praṇayanamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā camasabādhēnaiva niviśatē । taduktam—

lg.l: ucyatē yō guṇaḥ kāmyaḥ kratvarthēna na gr̥hyatē ।
kratvartha karma gr̥hṇāti sa ēva svārthasiddhayō ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: ataḥ siddhaṁ kāmyaṁ naimittikañca prakr̥tāvēvēti ।

prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—naimittikamityupala-
kṣaṇam । naimittikaṁ kāmyañca prakr̥tāvēva niyamyatō saṁyōgaviśēṣā- tprakr̥tisambandhabalīyastvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṁ pavamānēṣṭyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: santi pavamānēṣṭayaḥ—“agnēya pavamānāya purōḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṁ nirvapēdagnayē pāvakāya, agnayē śucayē” iti । tāsāṁ prakaraṇē samāmnātam—“vasantē brāhmaṇō'gnīnādadhīta” iti । tatra sandēhaḥ- kimagnyādhēyaṁ pavamānēṣṭyartham ? uta nēti । ārabhyānārabhyavāda- prastāvēnēdānīmārabhyavādapratibhātasyānārabhyavādatā pratipādyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—pavamānēṣṭiprakaraṇē hyādhānaṁ śrūyatē । prakaraṇātarda/?/mēva yuktam । nanvāgnīnādadhītēti vditīyāśrutyāgnyartha- tvamādhānasyāvagamyatē । ataḥ kathaṁ prakaraṇātpavamānēṣṭyarthatvam । maivam; iṣṭyarthāgnidvārēṇaivādhānasyēṣṭyarthatvōpapattēḥ । yathāvaghātasya darśapūrṇamāsārthavrīhidvārēṇaiva darśapūrṇamāsārthatvam । nanvagnēḥ pavamā-
ṣṭyarthatvē satyādhānasya tadvārēṇaiva pavamānēṣṭyarthatvaṁ bhavati । vāraṇādhikaraṇa ēva pavamānēṣṭīnāmagnyarthatvamuktam । ataḥ kathaṁ tadviparītamabhidhīyatē । ucyatē—tatra hyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyāpavādēnē- ṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvamātraṁ nirākr̥tam । na tvagnyarthatvaṁ pratipāditam । nanvagnyarthatvē sati pavamānēṣṭīnāmādhānasya ca ‘guṇānāñca parārthatvāt’ iti nyāyēna pavamānēṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvaṁ nirākriyatē । asati tvagnyarthatvē pavamānēṣṭīnāṁ prakaraṇātphalavadādhānāṅgatvamēvēti vāraṇā- dhikaraṇamēva bhajyēta । maivam; ēvaṁ hi tatra manyatē—āhitāgni- sādhyā hi pavamānēṣṭayaḥ । na tāsāmagnyarthānāmagnisādhanībhūtādhānā- ṅgatvaṁ sambhavati । tadvaraṁ viśvajinnyāyēna kalpitaphalatvamēva prakaraṇa- sadbhāvāt । ādhānasyaiva pavamānēṣṭyarthāgnisaṁskāratvēna tadaṅgatva- miha pūrvapakṣē pratipādyata iti na tēna sahāsya virōdhaḥ ।

nanvēvaṁ tarhyanēnaiva nyāyēnēṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvasiddhēḥ ‘guṇānāñca parārthatvāt’ iti sautrō hēturanarthakaḥ syāt । naitat; ētadarthapara- tvādēva sūtrasya । tadayamarthaḥ—ādhānasyāgnyarthatvādagnīnāñca pavamānēṣṭyarthatvātpavamānēṣṭīnāñca viśvajinnyāyēna svargārthatvānna pavamā- nēṣṭināmādhānāṅgatvamiti । yattu pavamānēṣṭīnāṁ tatrāgnyarthātvamuktam, tadiha siddhamēvādhānāṅgatvasphuṭīkaraṇārthamityavadhātavyam । tēna prakaraṇātpavamānēṣṭarthamādhānamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi pavamānēṣṭīnāṁ prakaraṇaṁ bhavēt । tathāhi—kalpiphalatvēna hiṣṭānāṁ prakaraṇaṁ vaktavyam । na ca kalpanāyāṁ pramāṇamasti । sādhyabhūtāgnisannidhānāttadarthatvē sati phalakāṅkṣānivr̥ttēḥ । na cāgnīnāmēva pavamānēṣṭisādhanatvānnāgniriṣṭīnāṁ sādhya iti vācyam । ādhānapavamānajanyātiśayadvayaśālī vahnirāhavanīyaḥ । tēnādhānajanyātiśayavataḥ pavamānēṣṭisādhanatvam । āhavanīyaśabdavācyasya tu sādhyamiti kō virōdhaḥ ? yathā cādhānapavamānajanyō'gnirāhavanīyastathā vāraṇadhikaraṇē bhadraṁ pūrvapakṣa ēvōktamiti nēha prapañcyatē । tasmādiṣṭīnāmagnyarthatvābhāvādanāra- bhyādhītamēvādhānamiti siddham ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣa darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu nādhānasādhyāgni- raṅgamityanāhitāgnērapyadhikāraḥ । siddhāntē tvāhitāgnērēvādhikāra iti । na cāgnyādhānamēvāṅgamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ, siddhāntē ca varṇanīyaḥ—“agnīnādadhīta” iti vākyēna labdhaprayōjanamā- dhānam । ajñātaprayōjanāḥ pavamānēṣṭayaḥ । tēna tatprakaraṇādā- dhānārthā ēva vijñāyantē । na cāgnēḥ pavamānēṣṭyarthatvādādhānasya cāgnyarthatvādādhānamēva pavamānēṣṭyaṅgam । “āhavanīyē juhōti”
iti vākyēnōpadiṣṭahōmānuvādēnāhavanāyavidhānāt । pavamānē- ṣṭīnāñca yajurutpattitvēna hōmasyātidēśikatvādaupadēśikāti- dēśikayōśca prāptikālavaiṣamyēṇaikōpadēśaviṣayatvāsambhavāt । na cātidēśādēvāgniḥ pavamānēṣṭyaṅgamiti vaktavyam । prakaraṇalakṣaṇō- padēśēna pavamānēṣṭīnāmēvādhānāṅgatayāgnyarthatvādādhānabādhitatvādya- thādhānasaṁskr̥tē'gnau pavamānēṣṭayaḥ kriyantē, tathātraivōpariṣṭādvakṣyāmaḥ । atō nādhānamiṣṭīnāmaṅgam । tāsāmēva prakaraṇēnāṅgatvāt । taduktaṁ sūtrakr̥tā—‘na vā tāsāṁ tadarthatvāt’ iti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamamādhānasya prakr̥tivikr̥tyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p: tadēvādhānaṁ kiṁ prakr̥tyartham ? uta sarvakārmārtham ? iti sandēhaḥ । atra ca prakr̥tyarthābhidhānamupadiṣṭahōmaprakr̥tivikr̥tyabhiprāyēṇa । siddhē ādhānasyārabhyaśrutatvē'gnyarthatvē cēdānīmagnidvārēṇaiva prakr̥tyarthatvā- śahā/?/nirākaraṇēna kēvalāgnyarthatvaṁ pratipādyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yathānārabhyaśrutaḥ khādiratvādiḥ srugādi-
dvārēṇa prakr̥tyarthaḥ, tathānārabhyaśrutamapyādhānamagnidvārēṇa dvirukti- dōṣahānārthaṁ kēvalaprakr̥tyarthamēva yuktam । nanu srugādīnāṁ laukika- tvāttatsvarūpē khādiratvādividhānamanarthakamiti bhavatvapūrvasādhana- lakṣaṇayā prakr̥tyarthatvam । iha tvāhavanīyasyālaukikatvāttadutpa- tyarthatvēnaivādhānōpapattērnāpūrvasādhanalakṣaṇayā prakr̥tyarthatvaṁ sambha- vati । ucyatē—ēvaṁ hi manyatē—nālaukikārthō'yamāhavanīyaśabdaḥ, kintu srugādivallōkasiddhāgnivacana ēva । “yadāhavanīyē juhōti” iti kratau viniyōgē kratvarthāntargatirastyēva । atastadvārēṇa srugā- divatprakr̥tyarthamēvādhānam ।

bhavatu vā'laukika ēvāhanīyaśabdaḥ, tathāpi tasyā- puruṣārthatvēnāvaśyaṁ kratāvēva vidhānaṁ vaktavyam । tatra yathā bhāviviniyōgapratisandhānēnādhānavidhānē siddhē'pi śēṣitvamāhava- nīyasya, tathā kratupravēśē'pyādhānasya bhāviviniyōgapratisandhānē- naivāhavanīyasya dvāratā bhaviṣyati । tasmādētadādhānamitarānāra- bhyavādavatprakr̥tyarthamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyāhavanīyasvarūpaprayuktamādhānaṁ na
bhavēt । na ca srugādivallōkasiddhāgnivacanō'yamāhavanīyaśabdaḥ । ādhānajanyasaṁskārarahitāgnimātrē lōka āhavanīyaśabdaprayōgā- bhāvāt । tēna laukikānāṁ srugādināṁ khādiratādividhēḥ prāgēva “sruvēṇāvadyati” ityādivākyairavagatakarmāṅgatvāttadvārēṇa khādira- tvādīnāṁ siddhē kratvarthatvē bhavatu prakr̥tivikr̥tyarthatvavicāraḥ । āhava- nīyasya tvādhānataḥ prāganavatasvarūpatvēna kratvaṅgatvē pramāṇābhā- vātkathaṁ tadvārēṇādhānasya prakr̥tyarthatvam ? taduktam—

lg.l: na tu karmāṅgabhāvē'sya pramāṇaṁ kiñcidasti tē ।। iti ।

chapter.p: tēna cālaukikatvē'pyāhavanīyasya bhāviviniyōgapratisandhā- nāttacchēpitvavadādhānasya kratupravēśadvāratāpi bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । kratūpayōgitvēna puruṣārthabhūtasyāhavanīyasyaivālaukikatvēna sruvavila- kṣaṇasya prayōjakatvē sati kratupravēśē kalpanānavakāśāta । atā nāstyagnidvārēṇa prakr̥tyarthatvam । kintu pr̥thagāddavanīyātpatiprayukta- mēvaitadādhānamiti ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē ādhānasya kratvaṅgatvēna pradhānaprayōgā- ntargatatvāttaddēśatatkālatatkarttr̥tvam । siddhāntē tu puruṣārthatvādādhā- nasya svakālē svadēśē svakarttr̥bhirēvānuṣṭhēyatvamiti । sūtrantu—sarvārtha-
mādhānaṁ sarvakarmārtham, na tu sarvakarmāṅgabhūtam । siddhāntē tasyāgni- niṣṭhatvāt । svakālatvāditi svātantrēṇa kālaviśēṣasya paurṇamā- syamāvāsyārūpasya vidhānādityarthaḥ । tēna sandēhabhāṣyē'pi yatsarvā- rthatvābhidhānaṁ tatsarvārthāgnyarthatvābhiprāyēṇēti mantavyam ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṁ pavamānēṣṭyanatidēśādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: santi pavamānēṣṭayaḥ—“agnayē pavamānāya” ityēvamādyāḥ । tatra sandēhaḥ—kiṁ pavamānēṣṭisaṁskr̥tē'gnau pavamānēṣṭayaḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta na ? iti । ādhānasya pavamānēṣṭyaṅgatvanirāsēnēha āhavanīyasva- rūpaprayuktatvē sādhitē prasaṅgadidānīṁ pavamānēṣṭīnāṁ pavamānēṣṭisaṁskr̥tē- 'pyanuṣṭhānāśaṅkā nirākriyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—darśapūrṇamāsavikārabhūtā hi pavamānēṣṭayaḥ tatra yathaiva prayājādayō'tidiśyantē, tathā pavamānēṣṭisaṁskr̥tō'pyagniḥ । na ca pavamānēṣṭisaṁskr̥tō'gniḥ pavamānēṣṭibhirvinā sambhavatīti pavamānēṣṭayaḥ pavamānēṣṭiṣvanuṣṭhēyā iti । na ca tāsāmapi saṁskr̥tāgni-
sādhyatvē'parāparēṣṭyapēkṣāyāmanavasthēti vācyam । anupādēyakāla- ṅgānurōdhēna yāvatyaḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyē nātikrāmanti tāvatya ēva kariṣyanta iti nānavasthā । tasmāttāsāmapi prayājādivatsaṁskr̥tō- 'gniraṅgamiti । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi pavamānēṣṭayō darśapūrṇamāsāṅgaṁ bhavēyuḥ । tā hyagnimātraprayuktā na darśapūrṇamāsāṅgamiti । nanvagni- stāvaddarśapūrṇamāsāṅgaṁ pavamānēṣṭiṣvatidiśyatē । na ca pavamānēṣṭārvi- nāgniḥ sidhyati । tēnāgnisidhyarthamēvēṣṭayō'nuṣṭhātavyā iti । maivam; upakārēṇa hi vikr̥tau prākr̥tapadārthaprāptirbhavati । na ca pavamānēṣṭī- nāmagnijanyōpakārapēkṣā samasti । atō'gnērēva pavamānēṣṭisādhyatvā- ttēnēṣṭividhēḥ prāgāhavanīyarūpasyāniṣṭatvāttadvyatiriktapadārthajanya ēvōpakāraḥ pavamānēṣṭiṣvatidiśyata iti na pavamānēṣṭiṣu pavamānēṣṭi- prāptiriti । bhavatu vāgnērapyatidēśaḥ, tathāpi pavamānēṣṭijanyasaṁskā- rasya pavamānēṣṭibhyaḥ prāgasiddhatvādāhitamātra ēvāgniviṣayaḥ kariṣyati । ētattvabhyupētyavādēnōktam । yatō'ṅgaṁ khalvatidiśyatē । na cādhānamātrasaṁskr̥tō'gnirdarśapūrṇamāsāṅgam । ādhānapavamānēṣṭija- nyasthaivāhavanīyasyāṅgatvāt । yata āhitē'gnau pavamānēṣṭīnāmanuṣṭhā-
nam । tadyadyādhānāṅgatvasidhyarthamudīcyāṅgabhūtāḥ pavamānēṣṭayaḥ, tadā tajjanyasaṁskārasahitēnādhānajanyasaṁskārēṇāhavanīyākhyaḥ saṁ- skārō janayitavyaḥ । sa cāhitāgnyanuṣṭhitābhirēva samānadēśatvā- tsidhyatīti yuktaṁ tatrānuṣṭhānam । na tvagnēḥ pavamānēṣṭayaṅgatvēnēti । atō na pavamānēṣṭiṣvapi pavamānēṣṭayaḥ karttavyā iti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—na pavamānēṣṭayaḥ pavamānē- ṣṭisaṁskr̥tē'gnau karttavyāḥ । tāsāmēvāgnyarthatvādagniprayōjanatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṁ paśudharmāṇāmagnīṣōmīyārthatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
asti jyōtiṣṭōmē paśuragnīṣōmīyaḥ—“yō dīkṣitō yadagnīṣō- mīyaṁ paśumālabhatē” iti । tathā savanīyaḥ ānubandhaśca । santi ca paśudharmāḥ—upākaraṇamupānayanaṁ, niyōjanaṁ, saṁjñapanaṁ, viśasanamityē- vamādayaḥ । tē kiṁ sarvēṣāmagnīṣōmīyasavanīyānubandhyānām ? utāgnīṣōmīyasya savanāyasya ca ? utāgnīṣōmīyasyaiva ? iti । śrutiliṅgavākyaiḥ saha prakaraṇasya virōdhāvirādhau nirūpyēdānīṁ kramasya śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇaiḥ sahaḥ virōdhāvirōdhacintāyāṁ
prathamaṁ prakaraṇēna saha virōdhāvirādhau nirūpyētē । atra yadyapi bhaṣyakārēṇa trēdhā sandēhō varṇitaḥ, tathāpi pakṣāntarasyāpi sambhavādvārtikē caturddhaiva darśitaḥ—kimayaṁ paśudharmastrayāṇāmēva ? atha savanīyasyaiva ? athāgnīṣōmīyasavanīyayōḥ ? utāgnīṣō- mīyasyaivēti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—jyōtiṣṭōmē aupavasathyē'hani caturdaśyāṁ paśudharmāḥ śrūyantē । na ca tē vākyēna kēnacitpaśunā sambaddhāḥ pratīyantē । nāpyavāntaraprakaraṇēnāgnīṣōmīyārthāḥ savanīyārthāḥ vā bhavanti । utpatau hi prakaraṇaṁ bhavanti । utpatiścāgnīṣōmīyasya dī- kṣākālē sōmakrayasannidhau daśamyāmēva । aupavasathyē tu paśudharmasa- nnidhāvanuṣṭhānamātraṁ śrūyatē । tathā savanīyasyāpi sutyākālē amā- vāsyāyāmutpattiḥ । anuṣṭhānaṁ tasyāpi paśudharmasamīpē । aupava- sathyē'hani guṇārthaṁ śravaṇam । anubandhyāyāstvaupavasathyē nōtpatti- rnānuṣṭhānam । sō'māvāsyāntē pratipadyanuṣṭhīyatē । tēna vākyāvāntara- prakaraṇābhyāṁ kēnāpi paśunā'gr̥hītatvāt jyōtiṣṭōmamahāprakaraṇē- naivāgnīṣōmīyasyānuṣṭhānasādēśyarūpaṁ kramaṁ bādhitvā jyōtiṣṭōmā- rthāstāvadvijñāyantē । tasya ca sōmadravyatvānna paśudharmaiḥ prayōjanamityā- narthakyatadaṅganyāyēṣvavatarantō'ṅgatvāviśēṣāttriṣvēva paśuṣu bhavantīti ।

na tāvadavaya pūrva/?/pakṣaḥ sambhavati । paśusambandhēna śrutānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ nirākāṅkṣatvāt । asaṁyuktagrāhiṇā jyōtiṣṭōmaprakaraṇēna grahaṇāsambhavāt vāraṇādipātrāṇāmiva yajñasambandhēna śrutānāmā- dhānaprakaraṇēna । atō nānarthakyatadaṅganyāyēna sarvapaśvarthatvam । ētacca vāraṇādhikaraṇa ēva vivēcitam । bhavatu vānyasaṁyuktasyāpi prakaraṇēna grahaṇam, tathāpyaupavasathya ēva savanīyasyōtpattēravāntara- prakaraṇēna savanīyārtha ēva dharmā bhavanti । na ca savanīyasya sutyākāla ēvōtpattēraupavasathyē prakaraṇābhāva iti vācyam । yēna “āśvinaṁ grahaṁ grahītvā trivr̥tā yūpaṁ parivīyāgnēyaṁ savanīyaṁ paśu- mupākarōti” iti vākyēna sutyākālē savanīyōtpattirvaktavyā । tataścāśvinagrahagrahaṇānantaryaṁ raśanātrivr̥ttvaṁ yūpaparivyāṇaṁ taduttara- kālamupākaraṇañca dravyañca dēvatā cētyētatsakalaviśēṣaṇaviśiṣṭō yāgō vidhēyaḥ । tathā ca sati sutarāṁ viśiṣṭavidhigauravamāpadyēta । asti caupavasathyē dravyadēvatāviśiṣṭayāgamātravidhāyakam “āgnēyama- jamagniṣṭōma ālabhatē” iti vākyam । na ca kathaṁ tarhi sutyākālē tasyānuṣṭhānamiti vācyam । tēnōtpāditasyāpi savanīyayāgasya sutyākālē punarutkarṣaśravaṇāt । ēvaṁ hyaupavasathyē śrūyatē— “vapayā prātassavanē caranti, purōḍāśēna mādhyandinē, aṅgaistr̥tīya- savanē” iti । atra hi prātassavanaśabdēna prātaḥkālīnō
jyōtiṣṭōmāvayavō'bhidhīyatē । jyōtiṣṭōmaśca sutyākālē'nuṣṭhēyaḥ । tatrēva vapādipracāraḥ śrūyatē । tēnaupavasathyōtpannasyāpi savanīyasya vapādipracāradarśanātsutyākāla ēvānuṣṭhānamiti śrūyatē । tatra ca pradhānadēśatvādaṅgānāmiti nyāyēnāṅgēṣvapyupākaraṇādiṣvākr̥ṣṭēṣu kālāniyamē prāptē aśvinagrahaṇānantaryamātraṁ vidhīyatē । anyatsarva- manūdyatē । taduktam—

tēnāyamatra sūtrārthaḥ—bhavētsarvēṣāṁ tulyaḥ paśudharmavidhiḥ, yadi prakaraṇāviśēṣō bhavēt । asti tu prakaraṇē viśēṣaḥ । yataḥ sava- nīyasya yatrōtpattistatraivōpākāraṇādidharmāḥ śrūyantē । ataḥprakāraṇā- tsavanīyārthā ēva dharmā iti ।

kṣōdīyānayamapi pūrvapakṣapāśaḥ । tathāhi—bhavatvēvaṁ savanī- pārthā dharmā anuṣṭhānasādēśyalakṣaṇātkramādagnīṣōmīyārthā api prāpnuvanti । nanu savanīyōtkarṣē sati paśudharmāṇāmapi sutyākāla ēvānuṣṭhānamityanantaramēvōktam । ataḥ kathaṁ dharmāṇānuṣṭhānasādē- śyalakṣaṇātkramādagnīṣōmīyārthatvamapīti । na ca sthānasāmarthyabalēna tatrāpi dharmānuṣṭhānamiti vācyam । dīkṣākālōtpannasyāpyagnīṣō- mīyasyāmnānasāmarthyabalādr̥śamyāmapyanuṣṭhānaprasaṅgāt । ucyatē—
sarvatra khalvanuṣṭhānasādēśyalakṣaṇaḥ kramaḥ samānadēśānuṣṭhānāvagati- rūpaḥ । taccānuṣṭhānasidhdirūpam । anuṣṭhānē siddhē kramāvagataśēṣatvā- nantarakālabhāvitvāt । paśudharmāṇāṁ caupavasathya āmnānasāmarthyā- danuṣṭhānamavagatamēvēti kramādagnīṣōmīyārthatvamapīti । tēna yadyapi savanīyōtkarṣē sati pradhānadēśatvādaṅgānāmiti nyāyēna savanāyāṅgā- tvēna yadanuṣṭhānaṁ tasya bhavatu sutyākālatvam । agnīṣōmīyāṅgatvēna tvanuṣṭhānasyaupavasathyakālīnatvabādhapramāṇābhāvādabādhitamēva dharmāṇāṁ tatkālānamapyanuṣṭhānamiti dīkṣākālaḥ syāt । tasya tvagnīṣōmī- yasya yadyapyāmnānasāmarthyēnātrānuṣṭhānamavagatamēva, tathāpi balavatā vacanēnaupavasathyē tadutkarṣādanyasya ca tadaṅgatvēnāpyanugrahahētōrabhāvā- ddīkṣākālāvagatamanuṣṭhānaṁ bādhyata ēva । iha tu na tathēti vaiṣamyam । nanu śrutiliṅgādhikaraṇaviruddhamidamabhidhīyatē । tatra hi śrutyā gārhapatyārthasyaindrīmantrasya na durbalaliṅgēnēndrārthatvamiṣyatē । tathātrāpi balīyasā prakaraṇēna savanīyārthānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ kathaṁ durbalēna kramēṇā- gnīṣōmīyārthatvamiti । ucyatē—tatraivaitadyatra śēṣasambandha ēva balīyasi pramāṇē pravr̥ttē durbalapramāṇasya nāvaśyaṁbhāvinī pravr̥ttiḥ । yathaindrīmantra ēva । iha tvagnīṣōmīyasya paśudharmairvinā sidhyabhāvā- davaśyaṁ durbalapramāṇē'pi dharmaprāptirvaktavyā । tatra kiṁ sakalōpadēśapratya- stamayē pravarttamānādatijaghanyādatidēśādbhavatu ? athavōpadēśāntargatā-
tkramāditi sandēhē satyupadēśarūpātkramādēvāgnīṣōmīyasya dharmasambandhō yuktaḥ । taduktaṁ sūtrakr̥tā ‘sthānācca pūrvasya’ iti । tasmātprakaraṇa- kramābhyāṁ savanīyāgnīṣōmīyārthāḥ paśudharmmā iti । ēvaṁ prāptē'- bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi “vapayā prātassavanē caranti” iti । vākyēna sutyākālasambandhēna pradhānōtkarṣē satyapyaṅgānāmu- tkarṣō bhavēt । na ca pradhānadēśatvādaṅgānāmiti nyāyēna pradhānō- tkarṣē'ṅgānāmapyutkarṣa iti vācyam । yatastatraivaitat yatrānirjñātadēśakā- lānyaṅgāni bhavanti । nirjñātadēśakālānāntu na pradhānadēśakālatvam । yathā jyōtiṣṭōmāṅgānāmēva dīkṣādīnāṁ viśēṣavihitadaśamyādikā- latvam । atrāpi savanīyāṅgānāmupākaraṇādīnāmaupavasathyakālē vidhānānurōdhēnānutkarṣaḥ । tēnōpakāraṇōtkarṣō vidhātavyaḥ । tasya cāśvinagrahaṇōttarakālaścēti prāptē karmaṇyanēkaguṇavidhānādvākyabhēdā bhavēt । bhavatu vā yathākathañcidvākyabhēdaparihāraḥ, tathāpyēkasya karmaṇō dvayōrutpattivākyatvāsambhavādēkēnōtpattiparasya ca guṇavi- dhānārthaṁ śravaṇamiti vaktavyam । tatra kēnōtpattiḥ kasya guṇavidhā- nārthatvamiti saṁśayē “āgnēyamajamagniṣṭōma ālabhatē” ityasya
“vapayā prātassavanē caranti” ityādivākyairēkavākyatvāpannasya vapāpracārādiguṇavidhānārthamēva savanīyānuvādakatvaṁ yuktam । upā- dēyasya vapāpracāralakṣaṇasya guṇasya dūrasthasutyākālōtpattyaiva savanīyakarmānuvādēnāpi vidhānasambhavāt । viśēṣēṇa ca prātassavanē sambandhāttatkālīnasavanīyayāgōpasthitau satyāṁ sukaraṁ tadguṇavidhā- namityaupavasathyaśrutānyēva “āgnēyamajamagniṣṭōma ālabhatē” ityupakra- myāpi “vapayā prātassavanē caranti” ityādivākyāni guṇavidhāna- parāṇi, sutyākālaśrutantvanupādēyasya kālasya tirōhitakarmānu- vādēna vidhānāsambhavātprakaraṇanyāyēna kālaviśiṣṭakarmavidhānārthamē- vēti tatraiva karmōtpattiriti niścīyatē । taduktam—
tēnaupavasathyē savanīyaprakāraṇābhāvānniṣpratipakṣēṇa sthānasya kramēṇa kēvalāgnīṣōmīyapaśuyāgārthatvam । atidēśatastu savanīyā- nubandhyārthatvāmiti siddham ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē tulyanyāyatayā paśupurōḍāśayāgasyau- pavasthyaśrutasyāgnīṣōmadēvatāsaṁskārārthatvātsavanīyē kēvalāgnidai- vatyatvēna tayārabhāvānna liṅgavirōdhēna savanīyārthatvam । siddhāntē
tu savanīyasyāgnīṣōmīyavikr̥titvādūhēnāgnyādisaṁskāratvādatidē- śataḥ savanīyārthatvamānubandhyārthatvamapiti । sūtrantu—pradhānōtkarṣē tadēkadēśatvēnōpākaraṇādyaṅgōtkarṣaḥ । tēṣāmaṅgānāṁ nirjñātasvakāla- tvādityabhiprāyaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṁ śākhāharaṇādīnāmubhayadōhārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p: asti sāyaṁdōhaḥ prātardōhaśca । santi ca dōhadharmāḥ—śākhā- haraṇaṁ gavāṁ prasnāvanaṁ dōhanamityēvamādayaḥ । tē kiṁ sāyaṁdōhārthāḥ ? utōbhayārthāḥ ? iti । kramasya prakaraṇāvirōdhaṁ pratipādyēdānīṁ tadapavādaḥ pratipādyatē । atra yadyapi bhāṣyē dōhārthatvēnaiva vicāraḥ pratibhāti, tathāpi pūrvēdyurdōhānuṣṭhānapratipādakavacanābhāvādaprasiddhatvēna ca śrutikalpanāyā asambhavāddadhipayōgata ēvāyaṁ vicārō bhāṣyakārēṇa dōhadvārēṇōkta iti mantavyam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “aindra dadhyamāvāsyāyām, aindraṁ
payō'māvāsyāyām” iti dadhipayōyāgāvamāvāsyāyāmēvānuṣṭhēyau, tathāpi dvayōrēva prātaḥ kālānuṣṭhēyatvēna dadhiyāgasya sadyōjātadadhi (?) miśrājyatvāsambhavādavaśyaṁ caturdaśyāmēva sāyaṁkālē dadhiyāgārthaṁ dōhānuṣṭhānamarthasiddhama । na tu payōyāgārtham । tasyāmāvāsyāyāṁ prāptaḥkālakr̥tadōhēnaiva niṣpattēḥ । dēhadharmā api śākhāharaṇādaya- ścaturdaśyāmēva śrūyantē । atō dōharūpāṅgadvārēṇa dadhiyāgasya caturdaśyāmēvōpakrāntatvādanuṣṭhānasādēśyalakṣaṇēna kramēṇa dadhyarthā ēva dōhadharmāḥ । tēna dōhayōścaturdaśyamāvāsyākālabhēdācchr̥taśabda- vācyaṁ dugdhaṁ dharmairasaṁyuktaṁ syāditi । ēvaṁ prāptē'bhidhīyatē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi pradhānasya dadhiyāgasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhānaṁ bhavēt । tathāpi pradhānasya khalu dharmōpadēśaḥ kriyamāṇasya balavatpramāṇāvirōdhē sati kramēṇa dharmagrāhakatvaṁ bhavati । yathāgnīṣōmīyasya paśudharmagrāhakatvam । na cēha dadhi- yāgasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhānam । “amāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajēta” iti sāṅgasyaivāmāvāsyāyāmanuṣṭhānāvagamāt । kintu dadhyarthadōhasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhānam । na ca dadhiyāgārthadōhasya tatrānuṣṭhānē dadhiyāgasya kramō bhavati । nāpi tatrānuṣṭhīyamānatvēna taddōhasya
kramēṇa dōhārthatvamēva, dharmāṇāmarthasiddhatvēna kramābhāvasyōktatvāt । ataḥ pūrvēdyurāmnātānāṁ śākhāharaṇādidharmāṇāṁ kramēṇa na dadhi- yāgārthatvam, nāpi dōhārthatvam, kintu prakaraṇāvibhāgādubha- yārthatvē satyēva kēṣāñciddharmāṇāṁ śākhāharaṇādināṁ dadhisidhyarthaṁ pūrvēdyuranuṣṭhānamiti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—prakaraṇāviśēṣādubhayasaṁ- yuktasyaiva śākhāharaṇādēścaturdaśīkālē śāstramēva paraṁ vidhānārthamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṁ grahadharmāṇāṁ savanatrayārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyōtiṣṭōmaḥ “jyōtiṣṭōmēna svargakāmō yajēta” iti । tatraindravāyavādyāḥ prātassavanē daśa grahā āmnātāḥ । tatra dharmāḥ śrūyantē-“upōptē'nyē grahāḥ sādyantē'nupōptē dhruvaḥ । daśāpavitrēṇa grahaṁ sammārṣṭi” iti । santyaparē mādhyandinē savanē aparē tr̥tīyasavanē grahāḥ । tēṣu mādhyandinatr̥tīyasavanīyēṣu ca sandēhaḥ—kiṁ grahadharmāḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta prātaḥsavanē yē grahāḥ tēṣvēva ? iti । adhikāśa- ṅkānirākaraṇārthamudāharaṇāntarē pūrvōkta ēva nyāyō'tidiśyatē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu dadhiyāgasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhīyamā- nasya tatkramabhāvēna dōhadharmāṇāṁ prakaraṇāviśēṣādubhayadōhārthatvam, grahadharmāṇāntu prātassavanānuṣṭhēyānāṁ prātassavanānuṣṭhīyamānagrahayāgā- rthatvamanuṣṭhānasādēśyalakṣaṇātkramādyuktam । na ca prakaraṇātkramasya durbalatvātprakaraṇēna sarvagrahārthatvamiti vācyam । kramēṇa prātassa- vanikagrahārthatvē'pi prakaraṇāvirōdhāt । ataḥ kramēṇa prātassava- nikagrahārthatvēmēva grahādharmāṇāmiti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadi prakaraṇavirōdhē kramasya viniyō- jakatvaṁ bhavēt । tathāhi—jyōtiṣṭōmāpūrvagr̥hītāḥ khalu grahadharmāsta- tsādhanībhūtagrahasambandhinastatsādhanatvāviśēṣātsavanatrayavarttigrahasamba- ndhinō vijñāyantē । na ca kramēṇa prātassavanikagrahārthatvē'pi prakara- ṇāvirōdha iti vācyam । apūrvārthatvapratipādakasya prakaraṇasya kramēṇaikadēśārthatvaviṣayasaṅkōcalakṣaṇabādhaprasaṅgāt । tasmātkramaṁ bādhitvā prakaraṇēna savanatrayavarttigrahārthā ēva grahadharmā iti siddham ।
prayōjanam—pakṣōktam । sūtrantu—yathā dōhadharmā dōhadvaya- sādhāraṇāstathā grahadharmā api savanāntarīyagrahasādhāraṇā ēvēti ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṁ raśanādharmasādhāraṇyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyōtiṣṭōmē paśuragnīṣōmīyaḥ—“yō dīkṣitō yadagnīṣō- mīyaṁ paśumālabhatē” iti । tatra raśanā śrūyatē, raśanādharmāśca “trivr̥dbhavati, darbhamayī bhavati, praviṣṭāntā karttavyā” iti । tatra sandēhaḥ—kimētē dharmā agnīṣōmīyaraśanāyāḥ savanīyaraśanāyāśca sādhāraṇāḥ ? utāgnīṣōmīyārthā ēva ? iti । prakaraṇakramayōrvi- rōdhāvirōdhau nirūpyēdānīṁ śrutikramayōrvirōdhāvirōdhau nirūpyētē । atra yadyapi sākṣānna raśanā śrūyatē, kintu “yūpaṁ parivyayati” iti yūpaparivyāṇādēva labhyatē, tathāpi darbhamayyādiśabdānāṁ yaugikatvēna parivyāṇākṣiptaraśanāviśēṣavacanatvādbhāṣyē raśanā śrūyata ityaktam । yūpaparivyāṇaṁ “yūpaṁ parivyayati” ityanēna yathāgnīṣōmīyē vidhīyatē, tathā “āśvinaṁ grahaṁ gr̥hītvōpānaṣkramya yūpaṁ parivyayati” ityanēna savanīyē'pi vihitam । tēna yūpaparivyāṇākṣēpādēvōbhayatraiva raśanāyāḥ prāptatvādraśanādharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ kimagnīṣōmīyaraśanārthā ēva utāgnīṣōmīyasavanīyaraśanārthā iti bhavati sandēhaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṁ pūrvapakṣaḥ—agnīṣōmīyasya kramē caturdaśyāṁ raśanā-
dharmā darbhamayyādayaḥ śrūyantē na savanīyasya । tēna paśudharmavadagnī- ṣōmīyayūpaparivyāṇārthā ēva raśanādharmāḥ । nanu śrutyā raśanā- mātrārthāḥ pratīyantē । śrutiśca vākyādbalīyasī । satyam; kintu yūpasvarūpasambandha ānarthakyādapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇayā śrutyā vini- yōgō vaktavyaḥ । tēna yathā śrutyā prakaraṇasahāyabhūtayā barhirdharmāḥ prakaraṇavartibarhirmātrārthāḥ, ēvaṁ śrutisādhāraṇyē'pi na piṇḍapitr̥yajñabarhirarthāḥ tathā raśanādharmā api kramasahāyayā śrutyā kramōpasthitāgnīṣōmīyayūpaparivyāṇaraśanārthā ēvēti । ēvaṁ prāptē—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyatē—bhavēdēvaṁ yadyagnīṣōmīyakramaśrutasya “yūpaṁ pari- vyayati” iti parivyāṇasya brīhiprōkṣaṇavadyūpadvārēṇa pradhānā- pūrvanirvr̥ttāvupayōgō bhavēt । kintu yūpasyālaukikatvēnānirjñātō- pāyaparimāṇasya sādhanāpēkṣāyāṁ “yūpaṁ parivyayati” iti dvitīyā- śrutyā yūparnirvr̥tyupayōgitvēnaiva parivyāṇasya yūpāṅgatvaṁ vijñāyatē । ēvaṁ savanīyē'pi “upaniṣkamya yūpaṁ parivyayati” iti dvitīyā- śrutyā yūpāṅgatayā parivyāṇaṁ śruyamāṇaṁ sādhāraṇasya yūpasyāgnī- ṣōmīya ēva niṣpannatvāt । yadyapi na yūpasvarūpanirvr̥ttyupayuktam, tathāpi svarūpē kāryē cōpayōgyaṅgaṁ bhavatīti nyāyēna yūpakāryapaśu- niyōjanōpayuktadārḍhyātiśayajananēnaivāṅgaṁ bhavati । ētacca yūpāṅgaṁ
parivyāṇaraśanātvāviśēṣādubhayaraśanāsādhāraṇā ēva bhavanti । na caivaṁ satyagnīṣōmīyayūpasyaiva kramēṇa sannidhāpitatvātkramasahāya- yā śrutyā tatparivyāṇaraśanārthā ēva vijñāyantē । prakāraṇasahāyayēva śrutyā barhirdharmā darśapūrṇamāsīyabarhirarthā iti vācyam । yatō ya ēva hyagnīṣōmīyasya yūpaḥ, sa ēva savanīyasyāpi । tēnāgnī- ṣōmīyayūparivyāṇaraśanāsambandhitvēna vidhīyamānā dharmāḥ savanāyē yūparivyāṇaraśanāsambandhēnāpi vihitā bhavanti । piṇḍapitr̥yajña- barhiṣō na darśapūrṇamāsabarhirbhyō'nyatvādyuktam । yattvasādhāraṇā dharmā iti tathāpi savanīyōtpattivākyē “trivr̥tā yūpaṁ parivīya” ityanuvādō raśanādharmasādhāraṇyādvinānupapadyamānō liṅgaṁ bhavati । tēna liṅgadarśanādapi sādhāraṇā raśanādharmā iti siddham ।

prayōjanam—pūrvapakṣē savanīyaraśanāyā darbhamayādiniyamaḥ । siddhāntē'gnīṣōmīya ēva darbhamayādidharmaniyama iti । sutrantu—raśanēti raśanādharmōpalakṣaṇārtham । tēnāyamarthaḥ—yadvadagra- hadharmāḥ savanatrayavarttigrahasādhāraṇāḥ, tadvadraśanādharmā api sādhā- raṇāḥ । liṅgadarśanaṁ cōktamēvēti ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṁ grahadharmāṇāmaṁśvadābhyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṁśayau
chapter.p: dūrādyacchiṣyatē jyōtiṣṭōmasya, yathaupānuvākyākāṇḍēṁ'śva- dābhyau । tatra sandēhaḥ—kiṁ jyōtiṣṭōmē samāmnātā grahadharmāḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta nēti । idānīṁ prasaṅgadvākyaprakaraṇayōrvirōdhāvirōdhau vicāryētē ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
